attributes.title: Back-end Engineer
attributes.description:
The ideal candidate

  • Has 2+ years of work experience.
  • Has product development / SaaS experience with Python and Django.
  • Has PostgreSQL experience.
  • Communicates clearly in English.
  • Is resourceful and agile, and remains positive in the face of problems.
  • Empathetic towards colleagues and users.
  • Expert working with different web tech stacks: libraries, frameworks, testing, etc.
  • Experience working with a backend MVC framework.
  • Excited about the challenge of working in a fast-paced environment with a small and talented team.
  • Consistent job tenure
attributes.projects:
Cash flow is the toughest financial statement to understand but it‚Äôs fundamental to funding your own growth. We build the most intuitive and actionable tools for companies to optimize cash flow performance. Our platform analyzes billions of dollars of B2B transactions each year, users spend 70% of their workday in Tesorio, and we save finance teams thousands of hours. As a result, they can invest more confidently and anticipate their capital needs further in advance.

We‚Äôre growing quickly and working with the world‚Äôs best companies and the largest bank in the US. We recently raised a $10MM Series A led by Madrona Venture Group and are backed by top investors including First Round Capital, Y Combinator, and Floodgate. We‚Äôre also backed by tenured finance execs, including the former CFOs of Oracle and NetSuite.
attributes.functions:
What you‚Äôll do day-to-day

  • Ship backend code for features to Tesorio's core product.
  • Work tightly with frontend and product to ensure the end product is first class.
  • Tackle a wide variety of technical problems throughout the stack and contribute daily to all parts of our code base.

What you can expect

  • You will work on a small, nimble team with 2-3 other engineers and a product manager.
  • You will own high-impact features with your team from concept to launch.
  • You will have a strong influence on how features come together.
  • Your team will have a chance to demo your work to the whole company each sprint.
attributes.benefits:
We‚Äôre now looking to hire talented Software Engineers in Latin America to join our growing team to help us implement a high volume of curated ideas and reinvent how complex financial transactions can be simplified. The projects you will be working on are critical infrastructure for many companies to maintain their cash flow. And the product is loved with an NPS of 67 and over 60% DAU/MAU.

We have a diverse, distributed workforce in five countries. We don‚Äôt believe that people need to sacrifice being close to their families and where they‚Äôd prefer to live in order to do their best work.

What‚Äôs in it for you?

  • Remote from anywhere in Latin America.
  • The majority of our Engineering and Data Science teams are distributed. We call our team "Remote Powered." At Tesorio, "remote" doesn't mean second-class.
  • Fast paced environment where you have a daily impact.
attributes.desirable:
Nice to have

  • Experience in Fintech
  • Experience troubleshooting and optimizing database performance

As a result, they can invest more confidently and anticipate their capital needs further in advance.

We‚Äôre growing quickly and working with the world‚Äôs best companies and the largest bank in the US. We‚Äôre looking to continue to build out our analytics capability with a Senior Analytics Engineer. This position would be part of the Data Science Team and own all analytical functions at Tesorio.

attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber es una app de servicio de entrega a domicilio que te da tiempo libre, ya que tus pedidos de supermercados y tiendas especializadas se entregan directamente en tu puerta. Somos una empresa de r√°pido crecimiento que opera en Chile, Brasil, Per√∫, Colombia, M√©xico, Costa Rica, Estados Unidos y Canad√°, y desde nuestra adquisici√≥n por Uber, seguimos creciendo. Now on we are changing to English because we need you to feel comfortable reading, talking and speaking from the very beginning!.
attributes.functions:
How many engineers does it take to build an app that simplifies grocery shopping for users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs how many we have in our Engineering team, working from different countries in South and North America. The Engineering team is dedicated to produce intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores and solving challenges along the way.
This role will have the mission to support the creation, generation and visibility of real-time metrics that are relevant to our business and enhance decision making through data. In order to further increase scalability, it will be necessary to generate metrics working with streaming.
What will you do?

- Create of pipelines that will generate real-time metrics.
- Plan, design and execute software engineering projects through best practices.
- Generating alerts and monitoring systems that generate, process and store data.
- Analyze and adapt the context and business requirements in order to generate metrics, from the creation and generation of events and consumers.
- Work together with different Engineering teams (Backends Engineer, Data Engineering, Infrastructure, BI Engineers, among others).
- Interact with different areas of the business to understand needs and metrics requirements.

- Paternity/maternity benefits
- Partnerships with banks
- Partnership with Caja Los Andes
- Wellness programs
En Cornershop, estamos enfocados en promover un ambiente laboral inclusivo y accesible, donde todas las personas se sientan valoradas, respetadas y apoyadas. Continuamos construyendo una fuerza de trabajo que refleje la diversidad de nuestros clientes y comunidades en donde vivimos y servimos.

attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name, Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place! How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America. The engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.

attributes.title: Software Engineer
attributes.description:
The candidate should possess development experience in C with an emphasis on systems-level programming on Unix. Experience with Unix signals, multi-threading, synchronization mechanisms, socket programming, Unix system calls, Unix shell scripting, Perl scripting, use of debuggers, and proficiency in developing software on many variants of Unix is required.
Preference will be given to candidates having prior experience in Application Security/Cryptography and exposure to assembly programming. Experience developing applications using FLEXlm is desirable, though not a requirement. Experience with licensing and other security systems will be of added advantage.
  • Technically strong in C/C++ with emphasis on system-level programming on UnixProficient in data structure and algorithms.
attributes.projects:

attributes.functions:
The candidate in this position will be part of the R&D efforts for implementing and supporting software security and licensing initiatives at Synopsys. Responsibilities include working on new releases of the Synopsys Common Licensing code from inception to deployment while ensuring that the resultant product works in a heterogeneous environment.
The candidate is expected to identify and formulate the key problems to be solved and develop state-of-the-art solutions. Must be able to balance multiple demands in a fast-paced environment, should act quickly using good judgment, and be self-motivated. The candidate should help achieve tangible results, demonstrate accuracy, thoroughness, and display commitment to excellence in product performance, reliability, and robustness. They should exhibit the ability to learn and apply new skills. Also, be tuned to current developments and trends in licensing technologies and security concepts.

attributes.title: Data Engineer
attributes.description_headline: What will you need to succeed in this role?
attributes.description:
• Experience with relational and non-relational databases.
  • Experience in data loading, using Batch and Streaming processes.
  • Experience with Apache Spark but previous experience with other distributed systems also are appreciated, like Hadoop, Cloudera, Databricks, Cassandra, HBase, Hive, Samza, Faust, Kafka, etc.
  • Proficiency in Python programming language.
  • Familiarity with Cloud technologies. We use AWS and Google Cloud, but experience with others cloud providers is valid.
  • Experience in the creation or development of Data Lakes/Data Lakehouses/Data Warehouses/Datamarts.
  • Experience in projects using Python.
  • You work proactively, responsibly and creatively.
attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name. Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place!
How many engineers does it take to build an app that simplifies grocery shopping for users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs how many we have in our Engineering team, working from different countries in South and North America. The Engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores and solving challenges along the way.
attributes.functions:
At Cornershop, we are looking for a Data Engineer. We are facing new challenges related to the storage, processing and use of large volumes of data. The Data Engineer will work on the analysis, design and implementation of Big Data solutions together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization. These solutions require various technologies and architectures to filter, transform and store data so that engineers, data scientists and business intelligence analysts can use it regardless of the scale of the data.

What will you do?
  • Work on the analysis, design and implementation of Big Data solutions, together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization.
  • Include various technologies and architectures in these solutions to filter, transform and store data so that Engineers, Data Scientists and Business Intelligence Analysts can use it regardless of its scale.

How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America. The engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.

attributes.projects: If you‚Äôre one of the new generation devs or maybe a self-taught developer looking for a career, Reign is an excellent match for you. We‚Äôre a company that loves new tech and new people, where you‚Äôll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team‚Äôs technical decisions. Our clients are large national and international companies like Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and many more; we work with them in their enterprise-wide software and we‚Äôre looking to welcome a new member into our dev team!
attributes.functions: We‚Äôre looking for developer grads that want to make a fresh start in the tech industry. Our ideal recruit will be always honest and asking lot of questions to their seniors. From Reign we hope you receive the right answers, to get you learning about our practices and needs. Our team fully embraces Agile rituals and methodologies and you will work the full development cycle, from design to implementation, hand to hand with top-notch talent. You will learn and maintain software applications with cutting-edge technologies and serverless architecture and you will also have the chance to improve your skills directly from our headless technology partners like Contentful, ElasticPath, Algolia, CommerceLayer, among others.

You'll be reporting to the head of our development and automation team while working in smaller teams on projects allocated per sprint.
attributes.benefits: Why should you come work with us? We have a wonderful team that knows how to ship while being relaxed and friendly. üìà In metrics we trust

• 4+ years of experience in engineering (software & data) & building dashboards / high quality visualizations
  • Fluent in SQL & Python
  • Experience in a customer facing role
  • Experience using dashboard tools such as Metabase, Looker, Tableau, etc.
  • Ability to familiarize and understand client data and processes and translate into a well crafted story
  • Ability to perform statistical analysis to inform business decisions
  • Solid writing, communication, and presentation skills
  • Exposure to machine learning and AI. Has worked with data science teams to streamline feature engineering / metrics and machine learning production analysis
attributes.projects:
Cash flow is the toughest financial statement to understand but it‚Äôs fundamental to funding your own growth. We build the most intuitive and actionable tools for companies to optimize cash flow performance. Our platform analyzes billions of dollars of B2B transactions each year, users spend 70% of their workday in Tesorio, and we save finance teams thousands of hours. As a result, they can invest more confidently and anticipate their capital needs further in advance.

We‚Äôre growing quickly and working with the world‚Äôs best companies and the largest bank in the US. We‚Äôre looking to continue to build out our analytics capability with a Senior Analytics Engineer. This position would be part of the Data Science Team and own all analytical functions at Tesorio.
attributes.functions:
This position will be focused on creating high quality data through engineering & quality testing for Tesorio customers and internal stakeholders such as Product, Sales, and Marketing & Customer Service. The position will also be responsible for nurturing an environment where all parts of our organization can benefit from our transformed data. The role will also be responsible for high quality visualizations and storytelling with data. We are looking for someone who has the combination of data engineering skills, business sense, and ability to speak directly with executives.
You are an ideal candidate for this role if you enjoy taking a problem statement and turning it into production quality data that can tell a story. You would enjoy speaking directly with customers, have solid engineering skills to transform data, and build dashboards without bugs or data quality issues. You would also be able to prioritize requests from multiple internal and external stakeholders and be able to say no to certain requests.

Responsibilities

  • Provide insights to customers and internal stakeholders through building high quality data sources & being able to visualize that data in a constructive manner
  • Be an expert on the data in our database, know every in and out of the data, and how to apply that data to a customer's pain point. Along with this documentation is key to democratizing that knowledge to further empower our customers & internal stakeholders
  • Create quality data through with an analytics stack that utilizes Snowflake, DBT & Airflow
  • Build strategic reporting for executive level stakeholders
  • Speak directly with both external customers & internal customers (sales, customer service, etc.) to understand their data and processes and convert into actionable insight
attributes.desirable:
• Experience with DBT
  • Degree in Business, Economics, Finance or Statistics
  • Experience with AWS (ec2, S3, glue, athena, quicksight)
  • Familiarity with ETL-as-a-service offerings like (e.g. Fivetran)
  • Experience with Apache Airflow
  • Expertise in data warehouse organization and best practices (e.g. star schemas)
  • Experience with user defined functions (UDFs)

attributes.title: Remote Senior React Developer

attributes.projects:
Fancy a challenge?

If you've got a few years' experience working as a Front End Developer, Reign would make a great choice for your next step.

We're a company that loves new tech, where you'll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team's technical decisions. With agile methodologies and processes at our core, you won't be stuck in loads of useless meetings every day; you'll be working flexible hours to fit in with your own needs, in an environment where you can make your voice heard. Our clients are large national and international companies like Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and we're looking to welcome a new member into our top-notch team!
attributes.functions:
We are looking for a Front End Developer to produce scalable software solutions. You‚Äôll be part of a cross-functional team that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.

As a Front End Developer, you will be responsible for implementing visual elements that are visible from the computer user‚Äôs vantage point within a web application. You will combine the art of design with the science of programming. You will be responsible for the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.

If you‚Äôre also familiar with Agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.


Responsibilities

  • Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
  • Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
  • Develop new user-facing features
  • Write reusable code and libraries
  • Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components
  • Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
  • Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
  • Work with data scientists and analysts to improve the software
  • Enhance application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Collaborate with team members and stakeholders
  • Bridge the gap between graphic design and technical implementation
  • Translate UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.
attributes.benefits:
Once we've received and reviewed your CV, we'll email to let you know how well we feel you'd fit into the role. If you make it to the next round, we'll send you a test to complete. Make sure you give it your all!

If your test goes well (we'll have several people reviewing it, so do your best) we'll be in touch about an interview. If there's anything important that you need to know before the interview, let us know and we'll do our best to help.

Reign is always on the lookout for the next great Junior UX/UI designer. So if you are a student and you‚Äôve almost completed your digital designer certificates then maybe this is your moment. We‚Äôre a company made up of people from all walks of life. We love experimenting with new tools and methodologies, sharing and learning with our teammates, and are focused on creating and understanding our projects deeply.
We collaborate on enterprise-wide projects with clients such as Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and many more. 
We‚Äôre looking to welcome a new member into our multidisciplinary team!

attributes.title: Full-Stack Developer
attributes.description:
As a Full Stack Developer, we're not just looking for someone who works methodically but also who can approach and solve problems cleanly. We want you to be able to put your knowledge and best practice to work!

  • Strong working knowledge in server-side development using Node.js
  • Experience in front-end development using frameworks like React or Angular
  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript
  • Familiarity with cloud architecture on AWS, Google Cloud, Serverless Architecture and CDNs
  • Familiarity with the concept of Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration pipelines.
  • Experience using testing frameworks (Unit Testing, E2E testing, etc.)
  • You'll definitely have worked in a multidisciplinary team that uses agile methodologies like Kanban/Scrum
  • Experience and familiarity with different types of databases (Key-value, Document store, Object store, Relational databases, etc.)

attributes.functions:
We're looking for an experienced Back and Front end coder with 3-5 years' experience.

Our ideal teammate would be someone comfortable working with development frameworks and library management, who can produce and scale software solutions alongside a multifunctional team. They'll be working across the software development lifecycle, from design to implementation. So, if you're able to work independently and responsibly, writing clean, solid code, then this could be your perfect job.

As a Full Stack developer, you'll be working with dev teams and product managers to bring software solutions to life, constantly innovating to build and improve products.

Responsibilities

  • Design client and server-side architecture
  • Build great-looking app frontends
  • Write effective APIs
  • Test software for efficiency and responsiveness
  • Review, refactor and update software
  • Design in and implement security and data protection methodologies
  • Build apps and features with responsive mobile design
  • Author technical documentation
  • Work with data scientists and data analysts to improve software

attributes.title: Back-end Developer
attributes.description:
• Proven work experience as a Backend-end developer
  • Extensive knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, web stacks, libraries, and frameworks like NodeJS, Express, and NestJS
  • Experience consuming and building robust, RESTful, and GraphQL APIs
  • Experience with relational and NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
  • Solid understanding of concepts like Microservices architecture, Serverless architecture, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Be familiar with the concept of pipelines for Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration and have used at least one platform like CircleCI, GitLab CI, Github Actions, Travis CI, or Heroku Pipelines
  • GIT, Github, Git flow, and experience with Code Review
  • Having been part of a multidisciplinary team and have used Agile methodologies like Kanban / Scrum.
attributes.projects:
Reign is an approachable, smart and international team of people who love developing apps and web solutions. We have comfortable offices in Santiago, near the biggest green area in the city.

Reign was founded by designers and developers so we created a work environment to suit you: plenty of quiet spaces to work, free coffee and access to the latest devices to tinker with. Our processes are agile, avoiding unnecessary meetings. We run regular tutorials on interesting programming, managing and design topics.

Since 2015 we‚Äôve been helping our clients around the world. We believe our diverse, focused, talented team makes us highly effective and helps us bring a fresh and open attitude to everything we do.
attributes.functions:
We are looking for an experienced Back-end developer to join our team! As a Back-end Developer, you will be responsible for the server-side web application logic, modeling data structures, choosing the right databases for the project requirements, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the Front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the Front-end elements built by your coworkers into the application. A basic understanding of Front-end technologies is therefore necessary as well.

If you have outstanding programming skills and a great passion for developing high-scalable and innovative applications, then you will love this job.

If you‚Äôre also familiar with Agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.

Responsibilities

  • Developing and maintaining all server-side components
  • Ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness to Front-end requests
  • Collaborating with Front-end developers on the integration of elements
  • Designing customer-facing Back-end services for various business processes
  • Developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code
  • Implementing effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions
  • Running diagnostic tests, bug fixes, and providing technical support
  • Documenting processes, including database schemas, as well as preparing reports
  • Recommending and implementing improvements to processes and technologies
  • Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of designers, developers, project managers, and DevOps.

attributes.description:
• 6+ years of software development experience
  • Extensive experience with full-stack development
  • Proficiency in one or more programming/scripting languages/frameworks (e.g. PHP/Node.js/Python/C#/GoLang, Laravel/Django/Express/Koa)
  • Proficiency in JavaScript programming and one or more JS frameworks (e.g. React/Angular/Vue)
  • Strong database design skills (SQL/NoSQL)

  • A great overall IT knowledge being capable achieving a basic understanding of the technology in short amount of time

  • Stable internet connection and home computer
  • Bachelor's degree or higher
attributes.projects:
Our values:
Scopic is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status.

Have the skills, the drive, and the passion to join the Scopic family?

attributes.functions:
What your day-to-day will look like:

  • Work on architecture design for projects. This includes research related to the project and defining the correct technologies that should be used to accomplish project goals
  • Multitasking between many projects while preserving and delivering a high quality work
  • Being proactive, highly motivated and involved in helping the other team members suggesting improvements and solutions to problems
  • Write technical documentation, individually or with help of other developers and TLs
  • Be involved as a developer on the project and be responsible for the quality of your part or for the entire project
  • Help with code reviews and technical project management
  • Work on finding solutions for both low level and high level problems
  • Help with defining test plans with QAs
  • Make project related technical decisions
  • Work independently and deliver quality results without the need of constant supervision
  • Cover the complete development of small scale projects
  • Lead teams of various sizes working on medium and large projects under the supervision of Operations and Engineering Head
  • Supervise the development of small scale projects
  • Ensure the projects are following best practices and are having a maintained and updated tests (e.g. unit, integration, functional)

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Jooycar is a platform for Smart Connected Cars. If you are interested in IoT, Mobile Dev, Big Data, Real-time processing, Artificial Intelligence, High scalability, Cloud, UX, Extreme programming, and top edge technologies..  this team is for you.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
We are Jooycar, innovative technology drivers for more secure and informed mobility. We seek to generate more satisfactory connected-car and usage-based insurance (UBI) experiences.

We believe our passionate and diverse team combined with technology and innovation is the way to generate value in our customers to become the leading Insurtech in Latin America.

We have been recognized for our ability to put innovation into practice as we are part of the INSURTECH 100 list of the world's most disruptive companies in the sector.

Our Values

Passion to Win: We are passionate about winning big, we believe in ourselves, and what we are after for, we put all the energy into what we do, with enjoyment and ambition.

We build from People: We are committed to the integral development of people and teams, generating contexts that display the potential, authenticity, professional and personal growth in each of us.

We do it Differently: We like to challenge the status quo and the way of doing things. We enjoy working in an agile mindset, open to discussion and learning at all levels.

We operate as owners: We avoid waste at all levels, we do more with less, we don't waste time on what doesn't add value, we think about maximizing value in the long term.

We never cross the line: We know that we handle very sensitive data, so we always base our relationships and decisions on transparency, care, and honesty.

Until the last Mile: We act with excellence and ensuring quality at every step of the process, to the last mile, pending to deliver results that radically improve the user experience and our clients.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Jooycar
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Jooycar is a platform for Smart Connected Cars. If you are interested in IoT, Mobile Dev, Big Data, Real-time processing, Artificial Intelligence, High scalability, Cloud, UX, Extreme programming, and top edge technologies..  this team is for you.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
We are Jooycar, innovative technology drivers for more secure and informed mobility. We seek to generate more satisfactory connected-car and usage-based insurance (UBI) experiences.

We believe our passionate and diverse team combined with technology and innovation is the way to generate value in our customers to become the leading Insurtech in Latin America.

We have been recognized for our ability to put innovation into practice as we are part of the INSURTECH 100 list of the world's most disruptive companies in the sector.

Our Values

Passion to Win: We are passionate about winning big, we believe in ourselves, and what we are after for, we put all the energy into what we do, with enjoyment and ambition.

We build from People: We are committed to the integral development of people and teams, generating contexts that display the potential, authenticity, professional and personal growth in each of us.

We do it Differently: We like to challenge the status quo and the way of doing things. We enjoy working in an agile mindset, open to discussion and learning at all levels.

We operate as owners: We avoid waste at all levels, we do more with less, we don't waste time on what doesn't add value, we think about maximizing value in the long term.

We never cross the line: We know that we handle very sensitive data, so we always base our relationships and decisions on transparency, care, and honesty.

Until the last Mile: We act with excellence and ensuring quality at every step of the process, to the last mile, pending to deliver results that radically improve the user experience and our clients.

attributes.title: Integration Engineer
attributes.description:
We are still a startup, grownup but a startup at our core, this is the place where you can make things happen and we expect you to bring change and enrich our culture, structure, and processes, you should have a:

  • Strong Computer Science or Software Engineering background.
  • Long-term experience implementing third-party solutions for applications across the enterprise or its units/departments. A plus for Netsuite, Salesforce, and SAP.
  • Experience working with Python/Django, or Go lang experience and familiarity with Python/Django.
  • At least a B1 English level, being able to comfortably have work-related conversations in English.
  • Good documentation and testing practices while building reusable code and libraries for future use.
  • Mindful application of security and data protection practices.
  • Design scalable solutions.
attributes.projects: Platzi's Product Team has the challenge of offering our students the best educative experience through our end-to-end platform. As a startup, we constantly face the challenge of iterating at a fast pace with experiments that explore the best way to satisfy the needs of our students. Our culture is very important for us, and a fundamental element of it is the constant and honest feedback as the best tool for professional growth. attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Platzi empez√≥ con 3 oficinas: Ciudad de M√©xico, San Francisco y sus HQ en Bogot√°. Hoy somos una empresa 100% remota y estamos en todo el mundo. C√≥mo funciona la cultura Platzi
¬øPor qu√© NO trabajar en Platzi?
C√≥mo funciona nuestro proceso de contrataci√≥n

Nuestros Valores

üë©‚Äçüéì Nunca pares de aprender

Buscamos personas con una inagotable curiosidad intelectual que est√©n con una constante hambre de conocimiento y lo demuestren. Que todo el tiempo est√©n leyendo, investigando, form√°ndose. Que nunca paren de aprender.

üíö Our community comes first

Nuestros estudiantes son lo primero. La comunidad es el s√∫per poder de Platzi. Cuidar a las personas que forman esa comunidad y asegurarnos que triunfen es nuestra prioridad.

üôå Own the outcome

Lo que hacemos es dif√≠cil. Estamos creando algo nuevo. Innovando en un √°rea donde nadie tiene respuestas y todo hay que inventarlo, experimentar, fallar, medir, iterar. Esto requiere la fortaleza de no rendirnos y aprender de nuestros errores. Siempre hay que tener un plan B y C.

üí™ Honest feedback needs courage

Al innovar podemos equivocarnos. Tomar malas decisiones. O simplemente necesitar ayuda. Decir lo que pensamos y ayudarnos mutuamente es clave. La retroalimentaci√≥n positiva y constructiva implica afrontar el conflicto. No tener comunicaciones pasivo-agresivas y sobre todo tener la valent√≠a de siempre decir la verdad. El pasado no importa m√°s que para aprender de √©l.

ü§ú ü§õ Teams > Heroes

El mundo no lo cambian personas sino equipos. Las cosas grandes requieren una gran colaboraci√≥n y no hay h√©roes √©picos sino grupos de personas √©picas que construyen el futuro. El trabajo en equipo siempre vence a cualquier hero√≠smo individual.

üìà In metrics we trust

Medimos todo. T√∫ eres lo que mides y es aquella m√©trica en la que te enfocas la que te hace crecer. Elegir las m√©tricas correctas es importante. Y lo que no se mide, no crece.

As a startup, we constantly face the challenge of iterating at a fast pace with experiments that explore the best way to satisfy the needs of our students. attributes.functions:
Are you on the hunt for exciting new challenges that boost your professional growth? If you‚Äôre an innovator by nature and an Operations Manager by trade, we‚Äôd love to hear from you! Read on to see if you‚Äôd be a good fit for the Scopic team of 250+ professionals from over 40 countries.

The Software Operations Manager will work to prevent and resolve complex situations with clients, monitor higher level project aspects (payments, rates, etc.), and handle escalations. This is an ideal position for motivated individuals with business-oriented mindset and strong client relations skills, looking for a diverse, fast-paced, fully remote environment.

The skills and traits we‚Äôre looking for:

  • Liaise with Accounting/Finance to assess, maintain, and improve project profitability
  • Monitor project, ensure the delivery dates and important deadlines
  • Manage clients and their expectations, address clients‚Äô concerns, and resolve any escalation
  • Lead the rate increases and other project-related changes
  • Lead or help with creation of non-project management materials (policies, guides, trainings)
  • Help educate their department members on new policies created by other departments as well as ensure the implementation of these policies

The right candidate will work with a team of skilled professionals from around the world to keep the company running smoothly and efficiently.
attributes.benefits:

  • Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like.
  • A workload you can rely on. We‚Äôll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we‚Äôll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Enara Health @ SF+NY+Latam
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr:
Enara is scientifically proven weight loss with a human touch. 
Enara is Silicon-Valley based start-up pioneering the use of data, digital, and clinical treatments to provide personalized plans with measurable results.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Enara is a world renowned medical weight loss start-up, based in Silicon Valley, pioneering the use of data, digital, and clinical treatments to provide personalized plans with measurable results. Enara was founded by people from Stanford, UCSF, Kaiser, ClassPass & Evernote.

The rate of obesity worldwide since 1980 has nearly doubled. This epidemic cannot simply be dieted and exercised away: Our mission is to develop the first ever platform to scale obesity treatment. Our platform allows for the latest breakthroughs in nutrition, exercise, and obesity science to be optimized and delivered in a series of personalized and programmable experiences.

Enara is a fast-growing 6 year old company. Our innovative team consists of clinical, technology, marketing, and finance talent who work collaboratively to ensure creativity, success, and global growth.

We are looking for similarly talented, passionate and motivated individuals to help us continue to build an exceptional company and deliver effective solutions to improve health and longevity by delivering high-quality medical weight management care.

Why work at Enara

  • Enara puts its people first, always. We're full of ambitious and kind human beings, who are focused on changing the concept of weight-loss as we know it ‚Äì and having a lot of fun while doing it.
  • This is the perfect time to join: Enara team is personal and feels like a family, formed by kind human beings who have each other's backs.
  • Enara is on an exciting path of hyper-growth ahead of the next round of fundraising.
  • We're tackling a big, exciting challenge: reimagining how individuals and medical teams see weight-loss . Your day-to-day job will be fun, stimulating, fast-paced and rewarding as you help people to become healthier and happier.




Headquarters

San Mateo (Silicon Valley), California
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:

attributes.title: Semi Senior Rails and React Developer
attributes.description:
Our current tech stack includes a Ruby on Rails monolith, Haml/Vanilla JS/Stimulus/React at the frontend, PostgreSQL and Redis databases, MemCache, and Elastic Search servers, and Sidekiq to execute background jobs. Then, Amazon S3 and SES, CloudFront, Mixpanel, and Stripe.
We never stop learning ‚Äîand you will learn a lot with us‚Äî but when it comes to the list below, we expect to you know about:
  1. Ruby and RoR, JavaScript and React. You care about performance, code legibility, and elegance.
  2. Git commands and git workflow.
  3. PostgreSQL.
  4. Code endpoints for REST API.
  5. Programming in general. Your code is clean and simple, you know and use encapsulation, abstraction, polymorphism.
  6. Writing and reading in Spanish and English. We are a remote team, which demands being great at communicating ideas or document processes.
attributes.projects:
Did you hear about Get on Board? Well, you‚Äôre looking at it right now üòâ. We are set to shape and transform the digital job market in Latin America, giving startups and tech innovators the spotlight they deserve and helping talented digital professionals find better, more fulfilling workplaces.
We can only realize this mission if we expand and grow, and this is where you come into play.
attributes.functions:
Our product was born a technology company, so we serve code for breakfast every day and it is very important it tastes and looks good. You will:
  1. Work side by side with the UX and UI teams.
  2. Face challenging problems that need high levels of abstraction in order to design simple solutions.
  3. Leave the code better than you found it.
  4. Solve bugs.
  5. Code a lot of tests in all their flavors.
  6. Write documentation. Knowledge is useless unless other people have access to it, and we are obsessed with documenting everything we know or learn.
  7. While senior developers will support your work, you will also mentor and pair with entry-level engineers to help develop their skills.
  8. Review a lot of code. Expect some days with five or six pull requests.
  9. Talk to and support our customers and users frequently via chat, mail, or phone. We code for them, so we like to talk to them.
  10. Once you'll get more experience within the team, you'll be able to build epic features that go through the whole stack: Ruby on Rails, React, SQL, background jobs, and/or integrate with APIs.
  11. You will be part of a collaborative environment. At Get on Board we are a team, and it's important to support each other in the company.
attributes.benefits:
We are an unconventional, contrarian company, and you‚Äôll definitely enjoy working with a small team of smart people in a no-bullshit, respectful, honest, and extremely agile environment.
Enjoy working in one of the first fully remote startups of Latin America (7 years and counting!).
In addition to that:

  • Flexible work: as long as you deliver, you will enjoy a fully flexible schedule. This job is compatible with family, kids and homeschooling, sports, music bands, and hobbies.
  • Truly remote work. As long as you maintain at least 5 hours of overlap with GMT-3 timezone and have fast Internet, you can be wherever you want.
  • A compensation that grows permanently alongside your performance.
attributes.desirable:
You will stand out if you:
  1. Contribute to one or several open source project(s) üí™
  2. Have worked remotely before. It sounds easy but working without people around for hours and with all the distractions of the internet is challenging and takes skills
  3. Know other programming languages. Being polyglot is a blessing.
Also: sadly, the tech industry has a lot of biases and prejudices. If you have had to overcome any kind of bias (gender, sexual, racial, nationality, class) in order to forge a career as a senior dev, we WANT to meet you.
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Get on Board
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr:
This is us! 
We are set to shape and transform the digital job market in Latin America, giving startups and tech innovators the spotlight they deserve and helping talented digital professionals find better, more fulfilling workplaces.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Get on Board is the biggest tech recruitment platform in Latin-America, with 600,000+ job applications sent. It offers modern tools for recruiters and a simple, curated experience for job seekers.
Thousands of startups and enterprises from Latin-America and the US trust Get on Board‚Äôs integrated platform and exclusive data on candidate performance to speed up their remote recruiting and lower dramatically their sourcing costs.

Meet the Gobers
We are a small, distributed team working remotely from Chile, Peru, Spain, Mexico, Argentina, and the USA. We are not defined by degrees or titles, as we come from different areas of knowledge, such as art, design, music, pedagogy, journalism, psychology among others.
We don't believe in hierarchies, and we all work together hand-by-hand towards the same goal: to promote awesome jobs for awesome people. That's our ethos.

Our Culture: Public by default
As we work remotely, we trust each other in making every piece of information available to the team, avoiding the 'bus factor' and ensuring transparency at all times. That's why everything is public by default, so nobody becomes a bottleneck in our daily tasks.
üëâüèΩ Check out our Handbook on Remote Work here. (Content in Spanish)

Want to know more about us and what we do?
üëæ Join our community on Discord
üéß Listen to our Podcast 'Working Without Borders'
üìì Check out our blogs:
- https://www.getonbrd.com/blog
- https://medium.com/getonbrd
- https://medium.com/get-on-board-dev
- https://medium.com/get-on-board-design

La base de nuestros comportamientos es la diversidad y la inclusi√≥n. Creemos que tener un lugar de trabajo donde se cuide la igualdad de oportunidades para todos es fundamental para un buen ambiente laboral.

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Smith | Commerce Reimagined. Performance Realized.

Smith is a performance commerce agency that designs and develops digital solutions, enabling over 500,000 transactions around the globe each day. Enerlink se ha posicionado como el socio de confianza para navegar las complejidades del mercado el√©ctrico para aquellas empresas cuyo core-business no es la electricidad. De esta forma, a trav√©s de distintas soluciones tecnol√≥gicas, buscamos facilitar la toma de decisiones para que nuestros clientes logren capturar las ventajas que presenta la transici√≥n energ√©tica.

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
En Autofact, somos la empresa de informaci√≥n y tecnolog√≠a m√°s importante en la industria automotriz en Chile. Nacimos hace m√°s de 7 a√±os con el objetivo de hacer de la compra de un veh√≠culo usados un proceso f√°cil, r√°pido y de bajo riesgo. Esto tanto para personas como para empresas.

Entregamos herramientas digitales y servicios de informaci√≥n (ej. http://www.autofact.cl o http://www.autofactpro.com).
Hemos sido reconocidos en varias ocasiones con aportes de capital y premios, por nuestra propuesta innovadora en la regi√≥n (Startup Chile, Capitales Semilla Corfo, Premio BCI Empresario, Empresa Wayra entre otros). Hoy es una empresa de 45 personas con m√°s de US$ 3,8 millones en ventas anuales. Atendemos a m√°s de 140 empresas, tenemos m√°s de 800.000 visitas mensualmente, entregamos m√°s de 35.000 informes de veh√≠culos al mes y realizamos m√°s de 4.000 transferencias de veh√≠culos digitales al mes.
El 2015 empezamos a desarrollar productos para el mercado de Per√∫ y luego para Colombia (2017) y M√©xico (2018), replicando nuestra operaci√≥n en Chile. Hoy contamos con clientes empresas y personas naturales en Per√∫ (www.autofact.com.pe) as√≠ como en Colombia (www.autofact.com.co) y M√©xico (www.autofact.com.mx).
A mediano/largo plazo queremos transformar la forma en la que se compran veh√≠culos usados, asesorando de forma digital y con sistemas inteligentes a personas en su proceso de compra de principio a fin. Luego, llevar este proceso a Latinoam√©rica.

attributes.title: Desarrollador
attributes.description:
We are looking for a fullstack developer with previous knowledge and experience in the development of technological products, preferably SaaS platforms.

It is important to find a developer with experience or the ability to work with the following stack:

  • TypeScript
  • React
  • APIs/Backend

With regard to soft skills, we are looking for a candidate who can match our values of honesty, excellence and focus on employee experience.
attributes.projects:
Have you ever felt lost or abandoned when starting a new job? Or as a manager, did you need to hire someone but did not have the time or resources for their induction phase? After a while in a company, have you ever felt that you are not valued or that you are not developing professionally? Have you ever had someone in your team with a high potential but there was no plan to develop his/her talent and retain it and ended up leaving the company? Most of us have lived this situation.

At Cassidi we are on a mission to build better organisations and improve the lives of employees. And how do we do that? We are developing an employee experience platform to manage the employee journey, from onboarding to offboarding, as well as the development of employees, so that they have the best experience even before joining the company, and so that employees who already belong to the company have a professional and personal development plan that meets their needs and those of the company.
attributes.functions:
He/she will work in our Development team. In terms of functions, he/she will build new functionalities in our SaaS platform such as:
- Creation of an text editor
- Comunicattion workflow among different stakeholders
- Massive load of user (e.g. through a csv file)
He/she will work with and under the supervision of our CTO

  • urql + GraphQL codegen.

Estamos desarrollando una plataforma en la que poder gestionar el proceso de onboarding, el desarrollo de los empleados y el de offboarding, para que tengan la mejor experiencia desde antes de incorporarse a la empresa, y para que los empleados que ya pertenecen a la compa√±√≠a tengan un plan de desarrollo profesional y personal adecuado a sus necesidades y a las de la compa√±√≠a a trav√©s de una potente oferta formativa incluyendo contenidos propios y en asociaci√≥n con diferentes partners.

Hemos dise√±ado un employee journey enfocado a la experiencia de empleado que aumenta la motivaci√≥n, el engagement, el rendimiento y la retenci√≥n del talento, tomando como elemento fundamental la formaci√≥n, y en el que RRHH y managers solo tienen que hacer unos clics para ponerlo en marcha, ahorrando un 70% de su tiempo en procesos tediosos y en burocracia, para que puedan dedicarlo a lo realmente importante en una empresa, las personas.

Shipit brinda soluciones log√≠sticas integrales al eCommerce, prestando servicios de recolecci√≥n, bodegaje, env√≠o de productos y tecnolog√≠a.

Bajo la promesa ‚ÄúT√∫ vendes, nosotros hacemos el resto‚Äù, el modelo de gesti√≥n los transforma en un aliado estrat√©gico de quienes venden online, porque se encargan de todo el proceso posterior a la venta, devolviendoles tiempo para que se puedan dedicar a vender y escalar su negocio.

Esto se traduce en que los due√±os del negocio ahorran tiempo, costos y las complicaciones propias de la log√≠stica, a trav√©s de la utilizaci√≥n de una plataforma digital amigable, confiable y √°gil.

El proyecto se cre√≥ en agosto de 2015, cuando sus socios fundadores (Allan Guiloff, Ingeniero Comercial U. de Chile, y Jos√© Tom√°s Novoa, Ingeniero Civil UC) renunciaron a sus trabajos en Fundaci√≥n Chile para replicar en Chile un modelo de negocios que ya funciona exitosamente en Estados Unidos, Inglaterra y Brasil, y que en Chile genera ventas por m√°s de US$1.000 millones anuales.

El crecimiento sostenido de Shipit se ha dado gracias a su posicionamiento como un socio estrat√©gico de sus clientes, pues permite que √©stos otorguen una experiencia satisfactoria a quienes compran online.

Para el despacho de los productos, Shipit ha generado una red de alianzas con los m√∫ltiples couriers como: Chilexpress, Blue Express, Starken, 99 minutos, Shippify, Chileparcels, Motopartner, entre otros. A ellos les entregan miles de paquetes diarios, eficientando el proceso de retiro y comunicaci√≥n de cada uno de ellos.

Parte del modelo Shipit se basa en los denominados ‚ÄúH√©roes‚Äù, un grupo de transportistas freelance, y que se encargan de retirar los productos, para luego llevarlos a nuestra bodega m√°s cercana. attributes.company.data.attributes.descr:
Rendalo Maq is the largest digital broker for construction equipment in Latin America. 

Backed by Y Combinator (S21), and 20+  amazing investors (US$3.5MM seed round).
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Rendalo Maq is the largest digital broker for construction equipment in Latin America. We operate out of 50+ partner locations and we manage the largest inventory in the region. We find any equipment in minutes helping contractors build faster in Chile, Brazil and Mexico.
Our software makes it easy for equipment owners to control the location, utilization and availability of their fleets. While it lets our clients to acquire, rent or replace any equipment they need in any city, anytime with a single point of contact, reducing costs, optimizing their productivity and keeping operational continuity.
We combine the fleet management software approach with the asset intermediation model, to build the strongest digital ecosystem for construction equipment users across the region.

attributes.title: CTO
attributes.description:
+5 years working on startup environment
Senior technical knowledge to be able to lead the tech development.
Business and operations understanding is required.
Proven capabilities to design and implement a tech solution.
Should be able to build and lead a team.
Focus on User Experience.
Focus on Product.
Experience tracking performance.
Fit with a fast paced and growing company.
Share our purpose of allowing more people to own a vacation home
attributes.projects:
Legria is a new startup with strong funding to support growth. Our purpose is allowing more people to own a second home to build their happiest memories.
We are executing the first stage, which is acquiring over 5 houses in the beach in Chile and then selling fractions of each house to different co-owners, where they will be able to use the house according to their ownership.
This will require a platform that shows the properties, explains how the co-ownership model works and allows to acquire these shares.
At the same time, we need to develop the platform to allow a fair distribution of the house usage among co-owners, while coordinating all aspects of property management.
Our plan is to rapidly expand to other vacation destinations in Latam.
attributes.functions:
The CTO will lead all technology aspects of Legria in a Co-Founder position.
Since this is an early stage startup, it's an invitation to join us from the beginning to design the best way to introduce tech in our business model. Specifically this implies designing the smart scheduling process for our co-owners, the property management platform to interact with co-owners and our internal property management information systems.
We are 2 full time Founders, Ignacio Del Rio and Pedro Mir.
As Legria grows, the CTO will need to incorporate resources and build a larger team, which requires leadership skills.
The role implies setting the vision on what technology is needed to fulfil the business plan, defining and obtaining the tech resources to execute the plan, making executive decisions on tech matters, be able to build and lead a tech team, managing the tech budget, continuously seek for tech innovations that could be incorporated.
attributes.benefits: Opportunity to join a hot startup from the start with Co-Founder rights.
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Legria
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Legria es una startup que permite cumplir el sue√±o de tener una segunda casa.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Tener una segunda casa es un lugar que ta da alegria y que a la vez es una buena inversi√≥n. Legria es una startup que permite cumplir el sue√±o de tener una segunda casa. Esto lo logra dividiendo la propiedad de la casa en acciones para luego venderlas, donde cada comprdor podr√° usar la casa en la proporcion de tiempo de la que es due√±o.
La tecnologia es lo que permite que la copropiedad funcione, permitiendo que los copropietarios puedan agendar de manera equitativa su tiempo, tener visibilidad de los gastos y administraci√≥n, comunicar sus necesidades a Legria y tener la posibilidad de vender su participaci√≥n a trav√©s de la plataforma.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:

At the same time, we need to develop the platform to allow a fair distribution of the house usage among co-owners, while coordinating all aspects of property management.
Our plan is to rapidly expand to other vacation destinations in Latam.

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: With a worldwide network of 447,000 locations in 160 countries, we continue to make the world a smaller place by closing distances between families and their loved ones through world-class money transfer. We also offer bill payment, mobile top-ups, prepai
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Ria Money Transfer (‚ÄúRia‚Äù) is a global leader in the money transfer industry, offering their services at 435.000+ locations across 160+ countries.

Founded in 1987, the company has grown from a single storefront in New York City to become one of the largest money transfer companies worldwide. In 2007, Ria was acquired by Euronet Worldwide, Inc. (NASDAQ: EEFT), a leader in processing secure, electronic financial transactions.

The company has multiple hubs and regional offices around the world, with its Global Headquarters located in California, USA.

Ria's network is comprised of banks, retailers, and SMEs, as well as digital channels.

In addition to money transfer services, Ria offers check cashing, bill payment, currency exchange and digital prepaid content in selected markets.

attributes.title: Front-end Developer
attributes.description:
This is a remote, full time consulting position
Must have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar

  • Strong understanding of JavaScript, its quirks, and workarounds
  • Strong understanding of features and utility functions of jQuery
  • Basic understanding of web markup, including HTML5 and CSS3
  • Ability to roll out well-implemented custom jQuery plugins
  • Understanding of features and limitations of the Sizzle engine
  • Ability to adapt various jQuery features, such as ‚Äú$.ajax‚Äù, to specific needs
  • Familiarity with input validation techniques and approaches
  • Good understanding of browser rendering behavior and performance
  • Understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
  • Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around such issues
  • Familiarity with JavaScript module loaders, such as Require.js

attributes.description:
• Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in computer science, or equivalent experience

attributes.projects:
ZeroFOX seeks brilliant, motivated, innovative Software Engineers who want to build scalable SaaS software in the cloud to help our team continue to rapidly innovate and scale. Our software is scaling up by over 50% per quarter, and we need more phenomenal teammates to help us stay ahead of that growth while providing ever-greater value to our customers, with ever-higher quality!

You‚Äôll join a team of software engineers, cybersecurity experts, and data scientists who are disrupting the cyber security industry providing Digital Risk Protection: Protection on social media and digital channels from security threats like social engineering, external fraud, data loss, insider threat, reputation-based attacks, etc.
attributes.functions:
• Develop components of our core SaaS platform written in Python, Django, Javascript, Node, Angular, and Go
  • Solve problems by either writing solutions from scratch or by using open source projects
  • Gain an in-depth understanding of all of the team‚Äôs code, systems, and tools
  • Contribute to existing tech stack and actively research and advocate for new tools, technologies, and methodologies to evolve it over time
attributes.benefits:
• Amazing Product: ZeroFOX has created a paradigm-shifting cybersecurity product that has been recognized as leading the next generation of predictive cyber solutions.
  • Bragging Rights: The Forrester New Wave(‚Ñ¢): Digital Risk Protection, Q3 2018, named ZeroFOX a Leader after a thorough evaluation of the top 14 vendors.
  • Tight-Knit Team: ZeroFOX Engineering is a community ‚Äì most describe our team as a group of talented, driven individuals who are incredibly committed to each other and the overall success of the team. All are encouraged to contribute their feedback and innovative ideas into our product, development practices, and operations.
  • Get Things Done: Innovation is woven into the fabric of our organization. Every aspect of our operations is purposeful; enabling us to research, develop and innovate faster than the competition.
  • Benefits: Competitive compensation, paid time off, and other benefits available.
attributes.desirable:
Experience with:

  • Python, including Django
  • Javascript, including usage of Node and/or Angular
  • Go programming language
  • Linux, Git, cloud development
  • Agile, continuous improvement processes
  • Containerized microservices
  • Experience designing, maintaining, versioning internal and external REST APIs
  • Understanding of message driven architecture
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Zerofox
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: ZeroFOX, the innovator of social media security, protects modern organizations from the dynamic risks of social media and digital channels. Each day, ZeroFOX cloud-based, SaaS platform processes millions of posts and accounts across the social landscape.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_: ZeroFOX, the innovator of social media security, protects modern organizations from the dynamic risks of social media and digital channels. Each day, ZeroFOX cloud-based, SaaS platform processes millions of posts and accounts across the social landscape, spanning LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google+, YouTube and more. Using targeted data collection, intelligent analysis and automated remediation, ZeroFOX protects businesses around the world against phishing attacks, information loss, account compromise, fraud, compliance violations, and financial loss. Forrester recently named ZeroFOX a Leader and Top-Ranked in Strategy for Digital Risk Monitoring in The Forrester Wave: Digital Risk Monitoring, Q3 2016. Led by a team of information security and high-growth start-up veterans, ZeroFOX has raised over $80M in funding from NEA, Highland Capital and others, and has collected top industry awards such as the SINET16 Champion, DarkReading‚Äôs Top Security Startups to Watch, and the Security Tech Trailblazer of the Year.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: As a Human Resources Administrator, you‚Äôll support our HR Department to ensure smooth and efficient business operations. You‚Äôll help perform the daily functions of the Human Resource (HR) department including assisting employees, coordinating employee life events, administering benefits, leave, performance management and compliance activities; and enforcing company policies and practices. In this role, you will be the "heart" of the company, representing the best of ZeroFox by taking care of our employees. Along the way, you‚Äôll have an opportunity to learn from, teach and grow with our ecosystem of amazing people and culture. Reporting directly to the Chief People Officer, this is an excellent opportunity for you to gain broad HR experience while contributing to the attainment of specific goals and results of the HR department and the organization.

attributes.title: Telematics and GPS IoT Engineer
attributes.description:
• Technical education (Electronics/Mechanics engineering) (can be final year student);
  • Basics of telecommunication systems and IoT technologies: 2G, 3G, 4G, Bluetooth, ability to explain GNSS technology fundamentals;

  • Good communication skills;
  • Capability to prepare technical documentation;
attributes.projects:
Imagine You hand an opportunity to join #Google, #Apple, #Amazon or #Tesla when they were just starting to grow. It would be amazing, rigth?!

Teltonika de Chile is a representative branch of Teltonika IoT Group, which is creating and manufacturing Internet of things (IoT) for over 20 years. From connected vehicles to networking, we seek our solutions to be used globally and become an indispensable part of any business.

Now we are constantly growing and looking for an organized Telematics and GPS IoT Engineer to join our team in Santiago, Chile.
attributes.functions:
Your working day will consist of the following functions:

  • Guide employees and customers on how to use Teltonika Telematics devices and solutions (consult, provide training);
  • Solve technical issues and ensure prevention;
  • Constant supervision and preparation of devices technical documentation;
  • Assess customer needs of new features, raise proposals for its‚Äô implementation and supervise implementation process;
  • Coordinate queries with R&D, Production, QA, Supply management;
  • Directly communicate with clients to answer technical questions (conference calls, visits to clients);
  • Perform quality assurance tasks before providing solution to customers.
attributes.benefits:
• The opportunity to gain experience in IoT;
  • Real potential to develop career opportunities in a fast-growing international company;
  • Multicultural and diverse environment which highly values knowledge and ideas exchange;
  • Internal trainings and knowledge sharing for constant professional growth;
  • Supportive, positive attitude in the team and teambuilding activities (summer parties, sports events, snacks and fruits, home-made lunch for employees, etc.) to boost and maintain the communication based on mutual trust and respect, at the same time keeping the environment inspiring and engaging;
attributes.desirable:
• ¬≠Experience working with IoT solutions (1-Wire, RS-232/RS-485, Modbus, MQTT, TLS) and¬≠¬≠ secure Cloud based systems (AWS, Azure) would be an advantage;
  • Practice with ticket based platforms (Jira, OpenProject, Service Desk) would be a bonus.
  • Knowledge of software, operating systems, server operation and programming languages (C, C++, C#, Java, Python) essentials;

We are Teltonika Teltonika de Chile. We break industry standards by making Internet of Things (IoT) easy. The key to success is our talented and ambitious team. We are constantly growing and now looking for an ambitious talents to join us in Santiago de Chile in Sales and IT support areas.

The ideal candidate is a motivated, well-organized individual who has a huge motivation in prospecting and developing strong relationships with customers. Our next addition to the team should see themselves compatible with a start-up environment that requires proactiveness.

Here you will focus on selling Telematics, or Networking devices.

Nos interesa mucho entregar un servicio que basado en la calidad y la eficiencia de en nuestros procesos ha sido clave en este camino, por eso nos hemos dedicado a dise√±ar y desarrollar la gran mayor√≠a de los servicios que utilizamos, de manera que se adapte perfectamente a nuestra operaci√≥n logrando mejorar los tiempos de entrega, disminuir porcentaje de error en las √≥rdenes y mantener la merma muy controlada. La Vega Delivery es un e-commerce de frutas, verduras y productos saludables, con el foco en la calidad de los productos y el servicio al cliente.

attributes.title: Tech Lead
attributes.description:
Who you are

You like writing code, and mentoring and managing other engineers. You are constantly learning and sharing that knowledge. You like shipping code to production. You know that tests, automation, and best practices are important. You enjoy working with a team and guiding other engineers, celebrating their successes and coaching them on areas of opportunity. You want to help our team execute our mission of uplifting people and economies with technology.

Responsibilities

  • Create products using Typescript, Next.js and Mongo. The goal is for our team to initially be full-stack, but specialization should be ok as we grow.
  • Guide our development of best practices, robust code and great developer infrastructure.
  • Establish and encourage a culture of empathy, service and participation in our team.
  • Build knowledge at a technical and business level that allows you to continuously +1 your game and your team's reach.
  • Provide architectural, design and quality guidance for your team.
  • Work directly with the product team to clear as many unknowns as possible before they become IC‚Äôs responsibilities.
  • Promote collaboration between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Gather and analyze context and data to keep a healthy ratio of technical excellence and debt in order to fulfill business requirements.

Requirements:

  • Experience assembling, aligning and assessing performance of technical teams
  • Deep expertise in software development and an affinity for Javascript and TypeScript.
  • Experience working on, with, or for startups.
  • Highly focused and self-driven.
  • Exceptional attention to detail.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English (Spanish is a plus).
  • Capability to learn & adapt quickly
  • Global & cultural awareness, and excited about working in a diverse environment with different types of people from around the world
  • Experience and knowledge of data security and privacy fundamentals: startups and partners trust us with their most valued information, and the systems that we write should be able to keep it safe.
attributes.projects:
We have backed more than 2,500 companies or 5,000+ entrepreneurs in 75+ countries. Notable investments in the 500 portfolio include Credit Karma, Twilio, Canva, Grab, Bukalapak, The RealReal, Talkdesk, Udemy, and Ipsy. Because of our global network and expertise, we are in a unique position to build startups ecosystems worldwide.

Beyond providing seed capital, 500 Global supports startups via their Seed Accelerator Programs which emphasize digital marketing, customer acquisition, lean startup practices, and fundraising for pre-Seed companies. 500 Global further contributes to the development of innovation ecosystems by supporting startups and investors through educational programs, events, conferences, and partnerships with corporations and governments around the world.
attributes.functions: The Digital Products team is generating software to support our mission of uplifting people and economies around the world. We create internal tools to bring efficiency and superpowers to our team. We create software to create value to our founders and the startup community worldwide.
attributes.benefits:
Benefits (people are our priority, so we want to make sure we‚Äôre taking care of them):

  • Unlimited PTO, plus Holidays
  • Eligibility to participate in Medical, Dental, and Vision insurance plans
  • Eligibility to participate in the 401(k) Plan
  • The opportunity to work with phenomenal people around the world!
attributes.desirable: Infrastructure knowledge is a plus (AWS, Docker, Vercel, etc)

attributes.company.data.attributes.name: 500 Global
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: VC firm on a mission to uplift people and economies around the world through entrepreneurship.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
500 Global is a venture capital firm that invests early in founders building fast-growing technology companies. We focus on markets where technology, innovation, and capital can unlock long-term value and drive economic growth.

We work closely with key stakeholders and advise governments and corporations on how best to support entrepreneurial ecosystems so startups can thrive.

500 Global has backed over 6,000 founders representing more than 2,500 companies operating in 77 countries. Our portfolio includes 33 companies valued at over $1 billion and 120 companies valued at over $100 million.

Our 140+ plus team members are located in more than 15 countries and bring experience as entrepreneurs, investors, and operators from some of the world‚Äôs leading technology companies.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
We have backed more than 2,500 companies or 5,000+ entrepreneurs in 75+ countries. Notable investments in the 500 portfolio include Credit Karma, Twilio, Canva, Grab, Bukalapak, The RealReal, Talkdesk, Udemy, and Ipsy. Because of our global network and expertise, we are in a unique position to build startups ecosystems worldwide. 

Beyond providing seed capital, 500 Global supports startups via their Seed Accelerator Programs which emphasize digital marketing, customer acquisition, lean startup practices, and fundraising for pre-Seed companies. 500 Global further contributes to the development of innovation ecosystems by supporting startups and investors through educational programs, events, conferences, and partnerships with corporations and governments around the world.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
Benefits (people are our priority, so we want to make sure we‚Äôre taking care of them):

  • Unlimited PTO, plus Holidays
  • Eligibility to participate in Medical, Dental, and Vision insurance plans
  • Eligibility to participate in the 401(k) Plan
  • The opportunity to work with phenomenal people around the world!

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: We are a buy now, pay later solution of household appliances for the low-income, unbanked sector in LATAM.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
At Graviti we are building the future of how families in LATAM access basic services. Through Graviti, low-income, unbanked families can purchase products home appliances with affordable loans with a buy now, pay later model. We are reducing social inequality with the use of renewable infrastructure powered by IoT technology.

Do you believe someone earns the right to be born into a specific situation? How is it determined that someone is born into a household with potable water, electricity or internet and someone is born into another one with no access?

At Graviti we believe this is due to chance and therefore we own the responsibility of using the benefits chance has presented us in order to balance that scale. We are passionate about using our skills to reduce the socioeconomic gap in developing countries and specifically about ensuring that every person has access to the basic services they need to develop their full potential.

If you resonate with this mission, whether you are a rockstar developer, a marketing expert or a finance wiz, we think you are key to achieving this goal and we would love to work with you.

We are remote friendly and results oriented.

About Gain

Gain is an easy-to-use tool that automates the gathering of feedback and approvals from clients or stakeholders, specifically designed for marketing assets. We automate menial tasks in the marketing workflow so teams can better use their time on more meaningful work.

We are a lean startup. Our founders bootstrapped this company and we grow thanks to the love we get from our users, not because of venture capital money. We‚Äôre a remote team across the U.S., Argentina, Puerto Rico, Colombia, and Mexico, on a mission to simplify approval workflows for everyone.

You can learn more about what we do at https://gainapp.com

  • Collaborate with front-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team to deliver well-architected and high-quality solutions

  • Write clean, readable, and testable code

attributes.title: Senior Golang Engineer
attributes.description:
Requirements:
  • 5+ years of backend engineering in a distributed systems
  • 2+ years in Golang or 5+ using several languages you were able to quickly pick up
  • Strong knowledge of a variety of database systems (Graph, relational etc.)
  • Experience working with 3rd party APIs and OAuth
  • Comfortable with strong dev ops culture
  • Strong communication skills in English and experience working as part of a remote team
  • Need to be located in timezones UTC-4 through UTC-8 (The Americas)
  • Excited to travel internationally for company retreats (twice a year)
  • Favorite Ted Lasso quote
attributes.projects:
Our mission is to help software teams get more done. Over the past decade there has been an explosion of specialized tooling in the enterprise. It‚Äôs putting the burden on each of us to jump between different apps and tabs to get our work done and at the end of the day we‚Äôre wasting valuable time. We believe there is a better way. Our ambition is bold: build the best platform for software teams to get their work done.
We‚Äôre just getting started and are looking to grow the team to help us accomplish our mission. We love what we do and are motivated by working on a product that we enjoy using ourselves. You would have an immediate impact as a builder and user influencing product. You would join the early team as a founding engineer and have full ownership working closely with our founders. Come join us!
attributes.functions:
Who we‚Äôre looking for
We are looking for a full-time backend engineer. Our ideal candidate has 5+ years of experience building event driven micro-services or service oriented architectures and has built most facets, if not all, in a "twelve-factor" app. Preference is for real experience (2+ years) in our primary language of Golang, but other languages are considered when able to quickly pick up new technologies. Additional experience in integrating with 3rd party systems, event-driven architecture, databases, and cloud services (AWS, GCP, etc) are important.
You will directly influence how and what to build, and must be comfortable collaborating on the architecture, code, product, etc as we have a strong culture of devops as well as being technically curious, thoughtful and purposeful in what we build. We value deploying frequently with well-written, maintainable, instrumented and tested code to a kubernetes cluster.
Responsibilities:
  • Develop new products and features in a small team
  • Collaboration with the team to solve technical problems and help shape the product direction
  • Provide technical input and knowledge to the planning, design, and requirements process for new products and features
  • Review other software engineers' code for correctness, style, and completeness
  • Support your team's production software by responding to an occasional alert or bug report
  • Write integration tests and work with our product team to ensure the operation and correctness of new features

The position will provide IP integration guidance to customers throughout their SoC flow to resolve technical challenges, perform integration reviews at key milestones and support silicon/system bring-up.
Masters/Bachelors graduates with 3-5 years experienced engineers are welcome.

¬∑ Provide ARC support to Synopsys's world-wide customers and field teams

  • Knowldege of advanced node technologies (10nm, 7nm, 5nm) are required.
  • Knowledge of timing corners/modes, process variations and signal integrity related issues are required.
  • Knowledge of circuits, logic design and a scripting language (e.g. Perl, Python or Tcl) are required.
  • Ability to be proactive and have a strategic mindset in addition to having tactical problem-solving experience.
