attributes.projects: SpacePointe is a global fintech company with platforms processing across 12 countries. We are looking for a senior PHP developer to join our amazing team! We‚Äôre looking for a developer that gets excited about regularly encountering new software challenges to solve across a wide variety of projects. Between our care for development practices and the variety of projects you‚Äôll encounter, you are likely to learn and grow as a developer while working here.
attributes.functions:
• Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.

attributes.benefits_headline: Some Addition Context on our Work Values
attributes.benefits:
• We‚Äôre quite flat, so you‚Äôll pair with other devs for peer reviews and with our PMs and Designers for ideation sessions.
  • You will be working remotely with a team that was remote pre-pandemic. As such, we emphasize an asynchronous culture that works to limit unnecessary meetings so you can focus on deep work.
  • We value and cultivate enjoyable working relationships among team members and clients and do what it takes to prevent toxicity - even if it means saying goodbye to a client that‚Äôs having a negative impact on the team.
  • We emphasize work/life balance and make sure our people don't get burned out.

attributes.desirable:
• Fantastic communicators. You know how to articulate your reasons for or against critical decisions and can disagree and committing. You equally enjoy giving feedback and receiving advice for both soft and hard skills.

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: QX is a white label end-to-end platform that streamlines financial markets processes, enabling efficient automation for the issuance, settlement, custody, management and trading of financial instruments.

QuantumX platforms can help banks, stock exchanges, brokers, custodians, arrangers, and other financial institutions to onboard users, share legal, financial and legal documentation, sign contracts, monitor the assets during their life-cycle and trade them when is required.

The platforms successfully integrates serverless technology with blockchain platforms - a web-based, single portal that connects all participants, reducing the need for multitudes of auditors, and accountants for cross-checking the counterparty‚Äôs transaction records.

We are reshaping the capital markets industry and exploring transformational business ideas in the fintech sector.

We are currently working with emblematic financial institutions (from the public and private sectors) to bring together highly disruptive solutions over the current market infrastructure. We are currently leading one of the most important and emblematic projects related to DLT/blockchain space in South America.

We have a flexible work schedule. However, availability to join meetings on regular basis (either in person or virtually) may be required depending on the company and clients need.

We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on any basis.

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_: Nisum Technologies is a global technology consulting firm headquartered in Southern California. Founded in 2000 with the customer-centric motto of Building Success Together, we‚Äôve grown to over 750 consultants and 8 offices across the United States, India, and Chile. Our philosophy and deep technical expertise result in integrated solutions that deliver real and measureable growth. The name Nisum is derived in part from the Persian word Nisbat, which means relationship, engagement, affinity, or alliance. We believe that the stronger the connection we have to you, our client, the more successful you will be in communicating your brand value through technology. We strive for the highest levels of Nisbat through continuous and open communication, which provides simplicity, efficiency, organization, and effective solutions to 21st century business challenges. Whether you‚Äôre a hot start-up, or a major global brand, our approach is the same: forge the most powerful connection possible between people, processes, and products in order to achieve unparalleled success.

attributes.projects: Sngular was founded in Madrid, Spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe. Today, we are a team of +800 in Spain, Mexico, Chile, Singapur and the US and provide a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world in industries as diverse as health, energy and telecommunications. From custom software development to AI, from ecommerce to IoT, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow. As we like to say, if a customer needs it, ‚Äúit can be done.‚Äù
attributes.functions:
**Who we‚Äôre looking for:**
At SNGULAR, we‚Äôre looking for a ** Salesforce senior lead developer** to build our client‚Äôs suite of applications. The client, a mid-size bank, pursues giving its customers a superior range of services (currently unavailable at more traditional banks). If you decide to join us, you will be in charge of a team developing software-based Salesforce CRM and leveraging external resources, working with the bank‚Äôs core banking, external banks, and other third parties. If you are passionate about technology, love guiding others achieve their full potential, and you know how to delegate, this is for you. This position reports directly to the enterprise development program manager, who reports to the CTO. The client is based in Boston, MA, and requires the person to be physically at their office.

You will be developing software based in Salesforce CRM and leveraging external resources to work with our internal banking core, external banks, and other third party services.

* This is a remote position to work with a project and a team based in Boston (MA).

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: An international team of expert hands-on information technology problem solvers that helps companies leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Founded in Madrid, Spain, more than 20 years ago as a developer of custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe, today, we have over 650 professionals working throughout the United States, Spain, Singapore, Chile, and Mexico‚Äîwith other international offices poised to soon open.

We provide a wide range of end-to-end technology solutions for companies in industries as diverse as health, energy, retail, and telecommunications. Despite our strong growth, we have not forgotten our roots as a startup and that, in the ever-changing world of technology services, innovation and nimbleness are the keys to our (and our clients‚Äô) success.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: Sngular was founded in Madrid, Spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe. Today, we are a team of +900 in Spain, Mexico and the US and provide a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world in industries as diverse as health, energy and telecommunications. From custom software development to AI, from ecommerce to IoT, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow. As we like to say, if a customer needs it, ‚Äúit can be done.‚Äù

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: QX is a white label end-to-end platform that streamlines financial markets processes, enabling efficient automation for the issuance, settlement, custody, management and trading of financial instruments.

The platforms successfully integrates serverless technology with blockchain platforms - a web-based, single portal that connects all participants, reducing the need for multitudes of auditors, and accountants for cross-checking the counterparty‚Äôs transaction records.

We are reshaping the capital markets industry and exploring transformational business ideas in the fintech sector.

We are currently working with emblematic financial institutions (from the public and private sectors) to bring together highly disruptive solutions over the current market infrastructure. We are currently leading one of the most important and emblematic projects related to DLT/blockchain space in South America.

We have a flexible work schedule. However, availability to join meetings on regular basis (either in person or virtually) may be required depending on the company and clients need.

We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on any basis.

The ideal developer should have knowledge of the following:

In our company, we value autonomous, proactive people. You should be able to:

You will be measured by the efficiency on how you complete the tasks assigned to you.

You need to have a high level of English.

attributes.title: Tech Lead (Software Engineer)
attributes.description:
Un ingeniero de software 11/10: maestro de la tecnolog√≠a y l√≠der de equipo. La expectativas es que vas a estar en las trincheras programando con nosotros y mientras que empiezas a armar el plan para nuestro equipo.
Impacto en Encuadrado = (Capacidad T√©cnica x Capacidad de Comunicaci√≥n) / Rigidez
  • Capacidad t√©cnica:
    • Full Stack que sepa front-end, back-end, serverless, bases de datos (relacionales y no relacionales), Cloud (AWS idealmente) y todo lo necesario para hacer una aplicaci√≥n (web y m√≥vil) que funcione Conocimiento y hambre de buenas pr√°cticas.
    • Conocimiento de web scraping
  • Habilidades de comunicaci√≥n:
    • Un excelente comunicador (verbal + escrito) y educador. Parte de tu responsabilidad ser√° subir al resto del equipo al carro de la nueva plataforma.
    • Somos creyentes que 1 + 1 = 3, as√≠ que para lograr el √©xito que buscamos sabemos que las cosas se trabajan en equipos con distintas habilidades.
  • Rigidez:
    • Somos una startup, a veces hay que cambiar los objetivos y botar planes a la basura.
    • Al mismo tiempo, tendr√°s que estar preparado para defender tu opini√≥n en los momentos de discusi√≥n y dejarla ir seg√∫n decidamos en equipo.
  • Un l√≠der:
    • Te va a tocar armar el equipo. Tienes que saber vender Engineering en Encuadrado, armar los procesos y documentaci√≥n necesaria para que podamos seguir armando un equipo robusto capaz de crear una plataforma que se ajuste a distintas profesiones, su manera de cobrar, y recibir pagos.
    • En el mundo de la tecnolog√≠a siempre aparece algo nuevo que aprender. Quiz√°s hay que aprender un nuevo lenguaje, quiz√°s hay que aprender a usar una API, quiz√°s hay que aprender a usar un protocolo que no conoc√≠as.

¬øQu√© vas a estar haciendo?
Vas a tener un gran desaf√≠o t√©cnico. Nuestra prioridad siempre ha sido aportar valor a nuestros clientes y darles la soluci√≥n que buscan. Para seguir escalando y creciendo tenemos que salir del paradigma en el que partimos. Tenemos todo hecho en Python Flask con server-side rendering y sabemos que algo que nos beneficiar√≠a un mont√≥n es separar el front-end del back-end. Sabemos que es crucial tener un codebase con altos est√°ndares que permitan a un nuevo developer sumarse al equipo con la m√≠nima fricci√≥n posible.
Durante este a√±o necesitamos hacer una versi√≥n 2 de Encuadrado para as√≠ crear una plataforma robusta que permita escalar a m√°s verticales y pa√≠ses. Mientras dure este proceso, vamos a mantener en funcionamiento la versi√≥n 1 (versi√≥n actual que est√° en producci√≥n).
  • Vas a liderar la creaci√≥n de una nueva versi√≥n de Encuadrado.
  • Evangelizando las buenas pr√°cticas de ingenier√≠a de software en Encuadrado para el equipo que vas a estar armando.
  • Tomar las riendas del reclutamiento de nuevos integrantes al equipo y priorizar los recursos necesarios para cumplir nuestros objetivos.
attributes.projects:
Encuadrado es una plataforma donde profesionales independientes, como nutricionistas, psic√≥logos, doctores, abogados, etc., automatizan y administran las piezas m√°s cr√≠ticas del funcionamiento de su negocio. Esto incluye los agendamientos de las citas de sus clientes, env√≠o de recordatorios, procesamiento de pagos y emisi√≥n de boletas.
Nuestra misi√≥n:
‚≠êQue todo profesional pueda independizarse, crecer y triunfar.
Estamos convencidos de que el futuro es del profesional independiente. Hoy en d√≠a la posibilidad de trabajar definiendo tus propios horarios, con tus propias reglas y generando ingresos completamente para ti es la tendencia que la lleva, no s√≥lo para quienes tienen que agendar sino que para otros profesionales que podr√≠an beneficiarse de la simplicidad de automatizar tareas gracias al pago por Encuadrado.
attributes.functions:
Venimos saliendo de un tremendo 2021:
  • Pasamos por el batch de verano de Y Combinator. (S√≠, la aceleradora de donde sali√≥ Airbnb, Dropbox, Rappi, Stripe, y muchos m√°s)
  • ¬°Crecimos! Sumamos a un mont√≥n de nuevos clientes, empezamos a procesar millones de d√≥lares al mes y tenemos un equipo incre√≠ble.
  • Levantamos una ronda de inversi√≥n para acelerar nuestro crecimiento en el 2022.
En Y Combinator te dicen que una startup es una buena idea si:
  1. El problema es popular y el mercado est√° creciendo.
  2. El problema es caro de resolver.
  3. El problema es frecuente.
Por eso, entrar a Encuadrado es una tremenda oportunidad: el producto es amado por nuestros clientes (tenemos muchos), hay miles de agendamientos al d√≠a y m√°s de un mill√≥n de d√≥lares procesados al mes pero tambi√©n:
‚úÖ S√≥lo en Chile hay m√°s de 2 millones de independientes, en LATAM, m√°s de 50 millones. Y lo mejor de todo, el mercado est√° creciendo.

En Magnet enfrentamos los proyectos con un enfoque de equipo por lo que lo m√°s importante es poder relacionarse con los distintos roles. Adem√°s de eso, nuestro Analista TI participar√° en:

attributes.title: Lead Front-end Engineer
attributes.description:
• 5+ years of engineering experience. You have previous success developing and shipping a large-scale application with a user-empathetic mindset
  • 2+ years of experience leading an engineering team. You have proven abilities in providing technical direction for a small to medium team of engineers.
  • You're product-minded. You take initiative to understand production intention, team goals, business context, and user problems to propose improvements, eliminate gaps, and reduce risk in the project. You contribute to and drive the teams roadmap with product and design. You meet with stakeholders across the company when needed to eliminate gaps in your knowledge. You work closely with design to make sure that a design is able to be built and that it has a logical system behind it.
  • Security-minded, You have a detailed understanding of security protocols like OAuth2/OIDC/JWT. You understand client-side cookie authentication and JWT. You should have an understanding of front-end security risks and how to mitigate them.
  • You're highly skilled with web technologies including JavaScript (React/Node), HTML, and CSS. These are important foundational skills for a front-end engineer and impact everything from performance, to maintainability, to accessibility. You understand which features can be used across the various browsers, you understand how to make a website accessible, and you know how to implement responsive design.
  • You have experience architecting complex front-end web applications.We use React/Next.js, but you might have experience with Ember or Angular. You understand the concepts of services, stores, state management, build tools, routing, testing, serverless functions, and API design. You might have experience working with micro front-end applications and you are able to discuss trade-offs when slicing up a front-end app. You have created frameworks and libraries to abstract away complexity in your application to amplify your impact across the team.
  • You have some experience with micro-service/cloud and enterprise architecture patterns. You have an understanding of cloud architecture patterns, like pub-sub and BFF APIs, and are able to work with other engineers to discuss the trade-offs and benefits. While you might not be setting up these systems, you understand how they work, why they're used, and how they can impact front-end app performance, product requirements, and front-end code architecture.
  • You have a strong understanding of design: You understand that as a front-end engineer it is your job to help uphold the quality of the product. You're aware that loss of quality is often death by a thousand cuts and you care when elements are a few pixels off. You're able to understand why particular interactions should be used and when and you're able to recommend particular UI patterns to solve user problems. You'll have contributed to or have built design systems in the past.
attributes.projects:
From the Mayflower to the moon landing, every venture relies on insurance. The $1 trillion insurance industry is fundamental to our economy and society, but remains stuck in the stone age. Incumbents rely on antiquated pen-and-paper process and there's a huge opportunity to transform it through technology. At Newfront, we're building software to supercharge insurance brokers and help them deliver a delightful experience to clients.

While we‚Äôre a technology-driven company, we believe that people and trusted relationships matter. Newfront believes in empowering people rather than "disrupting" them. Our singular mission is to create the future of work for this massive industry.

We believe breakout growth creates breakout opportunities and diversity drives innovation.
attributes.functions:
As an Engineering Lead at Newfront, you will work with a team building features across the platform to help clients manage their risk and supercharge our brokers. There are tons of challenging technical problems to solve that directly impact the lives of your teammates and Newfront clients.

Newfront scales by hiring brokers who join with their book of business. Through automation and artificial intelligence, we eliminate paperwork and pay brokers a higher split of their commission revenue. We represent a paradigm shift in the industry and career path for tens of thousands of brokers.

What you'll work on

  • Lead the development of product features: You'll be involved during product discovery and you'll contribute to the technical design process. You are product-minded and able to collaborate with a Product Manager to define the product roadmap and vision. You'll be responsible for speccing and guiding your team in building out features and infrastructure.
  • Shape business processes: As Newfront is a technology-enabled brokerage, we are looking for new ways to improve business processes by using technology. You will become the expert on how an area of the business functions and work directly with stakeholders to build optimizations.
  • Define technical direction: You will help shape the technical vision and roadmap for a large area of the product. You will also influence best practices and introduce new technologies when appropriate. You'll need to clearly communicate your vision with the team to gain support and a shared understanding of the technologies.
  • Mentor other engineers: You will working with more junior engineers on your team to help them grow and develop their skills.
attributes.benefits:
• $50k-$100k USD (based on experience)
  • All employees receive equity (based on experience)
  • $500 work from home stipend
  • Unlimited vacation
attributes.desirable:
• Proficiency with Typescript, React, Jest, and Next.js.
  • Experience with styled-components or similar CSS-in-JS libraries.
  • Understanding of containerization technologies such as Docker.
  • Experience using Vercel to deploy applications.
  • Experience with Node.js and/or serverless functions.

attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Cash flow is the toughest financial statement to understand but it‚Äôs fundamental to funding your own growth. We build the most intuitive and actionable tools for companies to optimize cash flow performance. Our platform analyzes billions of dollars of B2B transactions each year, users spend 70% of their workday in Tesorio, and we save finance teams thousands of hours. As a result, they can invest more confidently and anticipate their capital needs further in advance.

We‚Äôre growing quickly and working with the world‚Äôs best companies and the largest bank in the US. We‚Äôre looking to continue to build out our analytics capability with a Senior Analytics Engineer. This position would be part of the Data Science Team and own all analytical functions at Tesorio.

attributes.title: Integrations Engineer (Python)
attributes.description_headline: What will you need to succeed in this role?
attributes.description:
• Experience developing with Python.
  • Experience with relational databases.
  • Be able to connect Cornershop by Uber with other systems in various ways: REST APIs, SFTP, CSV files, etc.
  • Understand the basics of HTTP communication: REST APIs, HTTP methods, response codes, headers, payloads, etc.
  • Know how to process data with Pandas and Numpy.
  • Know how to write basic SQL queries.
  • Understand how ORMs work (SQLAlchemy, Django ORM, etc).
  • Know how to test your code.
  • Communicate in Spanish or English, especially in writing
attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name, Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place!
How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600 because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America.

We look for engineers who thrive when empowered to find solutions like to dive into systems, iterate quickly, and solve problems in a complex and diverse ecosystem.
attributes.functions:
• Design and implement integration flows between business services, middleware, and third parties using a variety of different platforms, APIs, databases, CSV, protocols, and data formats.
  • Participate in code review with other developers to ensure that each integration maintains a consistent level of technical standards set by the team.
  • Write maintainable and well-tested code making sure it works well in production using the right monitoring systems.
  • Develop integrations in collaboration with external partners that are designed and implemented as reusable building blocks, as appropriate, to enable more efficient integrations.
  • Work with other teams to introduce new data sources to ensure our integrations adhere to consistent and scalable patterns and Cornershop requirements

attributes.benefits:
• Additional vacation time
  • Cornershop Pop subscription
  • Health, dental, and life insurance
  • Tech platform to enhance your knowledge (O'Reilly)
  • Free language lessons
  • Online fitness programs
  • Moving day (two days per year)
  • Marriage or civil union benefits (days off)
  • Paternity/maternity benefits
  • Partnerships with banks
  • Partnership with Caja Los Andes
  • Wellness programs
attributes.desirable_headline: We would love you even more if you...
attributes.desirable:
• You work proactively, responsibly and creatively.
  • Experience working with Docker and CronJobs or Airflow

Cornershop es un servicio que te lleva el s√∫per y distintas tiendas de especialidad, a tu casa o donde quieras, en una hora. Shipit nace el 2015 para revolucionar la log√≠stica, con crecimiento promedio de 200% anual en ventas, y un equipo que la rompe.

¬°Invitaci√≥n abierta a todos los ninjas a participar de esta aventura!
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Shipit brinda soluciones log√≠sticas integrales al eCommerce, prestando servicios de recolecci√≥n, bodegaje, env√≠o de productos y tecnolog√≠a.

Bajo la promesa ‚ÄúT√∫ vendes, nosotros hacemos el resto‚Äù, el modelo de gesti√≥n los transforma en un aliado estrat√©gico de quienes venden online, porque se encargan de todo el proceso posterior a la venta, devolviendoles tiempo para que se puedan dedicar a vender y escalar su negocio.

Esto se traduce en que los due√±os del negocio ahorran tiempo, costos y las complicaciones propias de la log√≠stica, a trav√©s de la utilizaci√≥n de una plataforma digital amigable, confiable y √°gil.

El proyecto se cre√≥ en agosto de 2015, cuando sus socios fundadores (Allan Guiloff, Ingeniero Comercial U. de Chile, y Jos√© Tom√°s Novoa, Ingeniero Civil UC) renunciaron a sus trabajos en Fundaci√≥n Chile para replicar en Chile un modelo de negocios que ya funciona exitosamente en Estados Unidos, Inglaterra y Brasil, y que en Chile genera ventas por m√°s de US$1.000 millones anuales.

El crecimiento sostenido de Shipit se ha dado gracias a su posicionamiento como un socio estrat√©gico de sus clientes, pues permite que √©stos otorguen una experiencia satisfactoria a quienes compran online.

Para el despacho de los productos, Shipit ha generado una red de alianzas con los m√∫ltiples couriers como: Chilexpress, Blue Express, Starken, 99 minutos, Shippify, Chileparcels, Motopartner, entre otros. A ellos les entregan miles de paquetes diarios, eficientando el proceso de retiro y comunicaci√≥n de cada uno de ellos.

Parte del modelo Shipit se basa en los denominados ‚ÄúH√©roes‚Äù, un grupo de transportistas freelance, y que se encargan de retirar los productos, para luego llevarlos a nuestra bodega m√°s cercana. Ah√≠ se empaquetan, se despachan y se realiza el seguimiento hasta que son entregados al destinatario.

attributes.title: Full-Stack Engineer (.NET / React)
attributes.description:
We are looking for passionate, enthusiastic and proactive people that want to build their future with us.
We are looking for someone who is motivated by the prospect of delivering valuable, high quality updates to a feature-rich product. You will be designing and building features for our web and mobile applications and will need to understand considerations such as design for performance, usability and security.
You will be joining a highly skilled team that consists of excellent mentors with a great culture of supporting each other that will assist to increase your skill set rapidly. Agile processes are used to ensure that work is effective and efficient.
Experience and skill we are looking for

  • You have deep knowledge and experience in application development with .Net C# - ideally .net core
  • Experience with Angular or React for front end development
  • You have experience with modern javascript frameworks
  • You understand the design, implementation and operation of distributed Microservices and APIs
  • Understanding of API Security Best Practices
  • Experience in Entity Framework, EF Core, SQL Server/PostgreSQL
  • You have experience with CI/CD pipeline tools (Git, Terraform, Cypress, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy)
  • Technically proficient in AWS services (EC2, ECS, RDS, Lambda, S3 etc)
  • Experience working on a SAAS platform would be extremely beneficial
  • Good communication skills and ability to work with key stakeholders to produce a desired outcome.
  • You are proficient in English, both spoken and written. You are comfortable discussing technical topics in English and explaining yourself through written form (Slack / Confluence)

Currently, we are broadening our tool to larger teams with our 1st iOS version and upgraded web platform. Our challenge is to offer lightweight, reliable and intuitive tools to capture information in mobile and an accesible and visually rich dashboard experience on desktop. That‚Äôs why we are looking for a Vue Frontend Developer.

Lemontech es una empresa SaaS (software as a service). Al principio solo hac√≠amos software para abogados, pero ahora somos key players dentro de la industria legal (ahhh!).

El objetivo de nuestro viaje es hacer los procesos menos burocr√°ticos, y m√°s digitales. O como dice nuestro prop√≥sito: Transformar hoy la industria legal del ma√±ana, para simplificar la vida de las personas. ;)

En cifras: estamos en el mercado desde 2007. Tenemos 2 softwares, con m√°s de 12.000 usuarios activos de una base de 1.300 clientes en toda Latinoam√©rica. Y desde 2019 subimos de nivel y somos parte de Accel-KKR, un fondo de inversiones de Silicon Valley especializado en empresas Tech (that means we are world class right now!).


¬øC√≥mo es el equipo Lemontech?

Somos un equipo multidisciplinario e internacional. Inteligentes y buena onda. Extraordinarios, pero disfrazados de gente com√∫n y corriente. Sencillos pero bien condimentados. Algo as√≠ como una mezcla entre completos, teque√±os, ceviche y tacos (pero la versi√≥n saludable, obvio).
‚Äç
Tenemos m√∫sicos, humoristas, pintores, deportistas, influencers, artistas gr√°ficos y chefs. Tambi√©n aficionados a la lectura, a los juegos, a la jardiner√≠a y a los idiomas. Fun fact: entre todos hay personas que hablan espa√±ol, ingl√©s, alem√°n, franc√©s, portugu√©s, maracucho y japon√©s. Cintia est√° aprendiendo coreano y Ezequiel trat√≥ de aprender ruso, pero le fue m√°s o menos (kudos si sabes ruso y nos puedes ense√±ar).

Como grupo nos gustan varias cosas, pero hay 2 que sobresalen por sobre el resto: los teque√±os (gracias Evelyn por evangelizarnos con semejante manjar), y el Cat√°n. En Lemontech encontrar√°s de ambos bastante seguido. De hecho, siempre estamos organizando cosas para hacer el trabajo m√°s ameno, como cuando celebramos los cumplea√±os del mes con pizzas y cervezas (cuando estamos en la oficina, el √∫ltimo jueves de cada mes!). Ah, y NOS ENCANTAN LOS MEMES.

‚Äç- ¬°Buena! ¬øpero c√≥mo trabajan?

Lemontech est√° lleno de cracks organizados por √°reas: people & culture, finanzas y administraci√≥n, ingenier√≠a, producto, marketing, ventas, soporte y clientes. Cada quien se dedica a su especialidad, y trabajamos bastante colaborando entre equipos. Pero todos con un solo objetivo: replicar el Lemon Effect en todo lo que hacemos (el Lemon Effect: Disrumpimos Ayer. Transformamos hoy. Simplificamos ma√±ana).

Queremos ser nada m√°s y nada menos que el primer unicornio SaaS de Latinoam√©rica, e impactar tangible y positivamente en el sistema judicial de los pa√≠ses donde estamos inmersos. O sea, dejar el mundo mejor de como lo encontramos.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Lemontech es una empresa SaaS, donde d√≠a a d√≠a transformarnos nuestra manera de pensar para mejorar modelos viejos con tecnolog√≠a. Trabajamos con excelencia y sobre todo con empat√≠a, generamos impacto y nos enfocamos en trabajar en equipo. Nos entretenemos innovando soluciones genuinamente disruptivas que llegan a miles de usuarios de toda Latinoam√©rica ¬°porque somos un grupo de nerds/artistas/rebeldes con causa/influencers inmersos en un viaje! √önete!
Tenemos grandes desaf√≠os, ya contamos con oficinas en Chile, Per√∫ y M√©xico, y cada d√≠a tenemos m√°s usuarios alrededor del mundo, en todos los pa√≠ses, todos los idiomas y a toda hora! Poder atender un p√∫blico as√≠ de grande es, adem√°s de muy entretenido y desafiante, una gran oportunidad para crecer, aprender y desarrollarse profesionalmente.
Actualmente, buscamos incorporar a nuestro equipo a un Engineering Manager para liderar la c√©lula de Desarrollo Interno , si cumples con los requerimientos ¬°an√≠mate a postular!
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
En Lemontech creemos en el valor del equipo, tenemos horarios flexibles, seguro complementario, planes de co-financiamiento de estudios, abrazamos el trabajo remoto mucho antes de la contingencia COVID-19 y para aquellos que si van a la oficina creemos que la vestimenta no debe ser formal para que el trabajo sea de calidad. Creemos que la oficina tiene que ser un lugar en el que queremos estar porque nos gusta y hemos creado ese espacio pensando en ello.
Lo m√°s importante: nos gustan las personas que realmente son team players. La cultura de nuestra empresa se basa principalmente en la colaboraci√≥n, por eso el mejor beneficio de trabajar con nosotros es el excelente ambiente de trabajo con el que contamos.
Para beneficios m√°s espec√≠fico, consulta en tu entrevista ya que siempre los estamos actualizando ;)

attributes.projects:
Why Vacasa

We started with just one home and an idea: to bring homeowners and renters together with smart technology and caring local teams. Today, we‚Äôre the largest full-service vacation rental company in the US thanks to the people who give us their best every day. You‚Äôll fit right in here if you‚Äôre curious, collaborative, innovative, and thrive in a rapid-growth environment.

Do you want to be part of a team helping the largest vacation property management company in the US solve problems on a global scale? Are you excited to explore the benefits of scalability and performance by leveraging modern, cloud-based technologies? At Vacasa, we are constantly experimenting and fine-tuning our products. We value stability, security, and scalability.
attributes.functions:
As an Engineering Team Lead, you will be accountable for the team‚Äôs output and growth. At Vacasa, Team Leads manage engineers and are hands-on contributors, with varying percentage based on team‚Äôs needs. Here‚Äôs some of what you will do with your team:

  • Help design and architect applications and services to support the business
  • Review your team‚Äôs work and provide recommendations via code reviews and discussion
  • Explore new technologies and validate concepts to help your team choose the right tool for the job
  • Utilize predominantly scrum methodology and ensure the team conducts the appropriate ceremonies
  • Drive accountability and quality of team deliverables
  • Ensure appropriate monitoring and instrumentation is implemented for production systems
  • Advocate for quality standards and work with your team to create robust testing capabilities

What you‚Äôll do as a leader

  • Work with your team to deliver robust products
  • Manage a team of software engineers and quality assurance engineers
  • Be an effective bridge between Product and the rest of your team
  • Manage change and contingencies for your team with a Product Manager
  • Participate in and encourage collaborative conversations around problem-solving
  • Provide a productive outlook and ensure all voices are heard to shape your team‚Äôs culture
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to other software engineers on your team
  • Handle disputes and debates fairly and provide timely and direct feedback to all team members
  • Foster a tech culture where you lead by example

üö¢‚úàÔ∏è KLog.co is the platform that moves and digitizes your cargo.

We believe there is no reason for logistics to be complex, so we simplify it. We move, control and improve your supply chain through our comprehensive platform.

In order to make this a reality, our team focuses heavily on UI & UX providing an intuitive and centralized experience.

Currently we are facing a whole set of frontend and backend heavy features, a complete rebranding and revamp of our platform.

Regarding our team, we take pride on our cultural mix of seasoned logistics experts and tech savvy engineers.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: KLog.co
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: KLog.co is the first LATAM company to democratize access to international freight and trade in the region thanks to its intuitive digital platform.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
KLog.co is the first LATAM company to democratize access to international freight and trade in the region. In just nine years it has been able to position themselves as a solid leader in digitalizing and innovating towards making the logistics ecosystem better for all. Through their intuitive digital supply chain platform, users can book and follow through their shipment fully online, while being able to control, measure and optimize their performance.

The success of KLog.co is a consequence of the vast logistics experience of the team and the latter is the result of a great culture, where its story is about learning, growth and technology. The members share the same story, where they started as apprentices and fought to become what they are today. The company believes in effort and passion over knowledge, since they are convinced that, if you have the attitude, the rest can be learned.

KLog.co today has more than 3,000 clients with operations throughout the Latin American region and hundreds of agents around the world. Their operational offices are located in Chile and Peru and they are in the process of opening offices in Bolivia, Colombia, Panama, Uruguay and Mexico.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
üö¢‚úàÔ∏è KLog.co is the next-gen freight forwarder digitizing supply chains.

We believe there is no reason for logistics to be complex, so we simplify it. We move, control and improve supply chains through our comprehensive digital platform.

In order to make this a reality, our Data & BI team works hard to gather, analyze, and present all information that our clients need to visualize their cargo and make data-driven decisions.

We are constantly working to provide our clients with accurate, up-to-date information on their cargo: where is it, when is it arriving, what's the next step. We also provide our clients with data-based advice so that they optimize their supply chain and reduce risks.

We strongly believe that developers are not ticket tackers, but play a key role of our platform's success, taking ownership over whole projects, understanding the underlying business and making sensible decisions.

attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Corbin and Brooks
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Corbin and Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company. We work closely with a small number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
The Corbin & Brooks team have over 50 years‚Äô combined experience with software and web development, UI and product design. Our roots are in enterprise web application development. In 2014 the energy management SaaS company we co-founded was acquired, and we started a private contracting business. We currently provide extremely responsive custom software development services for a small group of clients. Our specialty is custom development of enterprise software applications, and interactive UI design.

Our philosophy is to work with a small number of clients and serve as their ongoing development team. We strive to work responsively, offer co-coding to ensure multiple team members always understand a code so a project can be picked up at any time, and keep projects on schedule for our clients.

We work 100% remotely, and communicate throughout the day using project management software and videoconferencing when needed.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Corbin & Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company.

We work closely with a limited number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team for their projects.

We are currently looking for a competent project manager who loves gathering requirements, organizing JIRA boards, talking with clients, zoom meetings, and communicating with our internal team to move projects forward. Our mission is for every project to be on time and within budget.

The project management position won't take the entire 40 hour work week, so we are expecting this person will also perform QA tasks approximately half of the work week. QA requirements will be learning how to run projects locally, testing the features developed by developers, and reporting bugs and issues found.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
Corbin & Brooks offers an extremely flexible work schedule, fully remote work, and lots of flexibility when it comes to planning vacations and time off for life events.

Our projects are almost all long term projects where we are building exciting and innovative web and mobile applications which are being used by real customers in a variety of industries.

We are proud to have a friendly and communicative work environment with a positive team of people across North and South America.

This position is a contract position and the applicant will not technically be an employee of the company, but there will be an expectation of 160 hours of work per month.

Somos una Fintech que nace a mediados del 2019 en Chile, y que ofrece servicios de financiamiento a pymes a trav√©s de una plataforma online. En el 2021, en plena pandemia Covid-19, inicia operaciones en M√©xico, consolid√°ndose como una de las FinTech B2B de m√°s acelerado crecimiento en LatAm.

La tecnolog√≠a de Xepelin cuenta con un algoritmo que permite aprobar operaciones de revenue-based y AP- based financiamiento a nuestros clientes entre 60 minutos y 24 hrs desde que recibimos la solicitud.

Adem√°s, tiene una tasa de crecimiento de 30% mensual y ya son m√°s de 10.000 usuarios en la plataforma, quienes han accedido a m√°s de 1 bill√≥n de d√≥lares en financiamiento durante los √∫ltimos 2 a√±os, lo que posiciona a Xepelin como una de las FinTech de m√°s r√°pido crecimiento en LatAm. Su m√°s reciente ronda de inversi√≥n fue por 230 millones de d√≥lares -r√©cord en Chile-, la cual fue liderada por Kaszek, y co-liderada por DST Global.

Sobre el equipo, contamos con una diversidad cultural amplia, somos +350 colaboradores repartidos en varios pa√≠ses. Nuestro equipo est√° formado por personas de Chile, M√©xico, Colombia, Per√∫, El Salvador, Rep√∫blica Dominicana, Costa Rica, Venezuela, Argentina y Brasil.


Cultura

Estimulante: Tienes una actitud optimista de "poder hacer" y planteas nuevas ideas creativas para simplificar la vida de nuestros usuarios, clientes, socios y colegas. Buscas generar ambientes positivos y soluciones simples/iterativas.

Emp√°tico/a: Comprendes las experiencias y emociones de los dem√°s. Act√∫as con amabilidad, compasi√≥n y respeto.

Empoderado/a: Asumes la responsabilidad de ayudar a otros a lograr sus objetivos. Entrenas y desarrollas a otros en todos los niveles de la organizaci√≥n. Promueves la apertura y feedback.

Confianza: Haces lo correcto. Hablas con sinceridad y act√∫as con integridad. Cumples los compromisos.

Adaptable: Eres flexible. Te ajustas r√°pidamente a las nuevas prioridades y condiciones. Afrontas eficazmente la complejidad y el cambio.

Energ√≠a de Startup: quieres trabajar en una Startup y tienes actitud emprendedor.

Data-driven: Tomas decisiones en base a informaci√≥n real del comportamiento de nuestros clientes. Compartes informaci√≥n y datos con otros equipos a trav√©s de interfaces de servicio.

attributes.title: Back-end Software Engineer
attributes.description:
You are a Computer Science Engineer (or similar), with a high level of performance and experience working as a back-end software engineer in challenging teams. You like to work with other people who are as or more competent than you because it allows you to learn and achieve better results together.
You are comfortable doing your work and studying in English. You could be employed by Google or Amazon but you prefer to live in Chile, or you want to make a significant impact in a company. You care about the work environment and good people skills. You are willing to receive and deliver constructive criticism, and you value horizontality within a company.
Hard requirements:
1.- English: advanced technical level in reading and writing.
2.- Experience working in team workflows with CI/CD, pull requests, code reviews.
3.- Programming: advanced experience with Python.
4.- Linux: intermediate user level, including shell experience.
5.- Databases: modeling, SQL, etc, with hands-on experience with some of the popular engines, ideally PostgreSQL.
6.- APIs: consuming and designing web APIs (e.g. REST)
7.- Cloud: experience implementing cloud-native workloads running in production on some public cloud (Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS)) or PaaS, using the corresponding services for e.g. storage, DB, cache, horizontal scaling (with containers e.g. Docker)
attributes.projects:
Cordada is a high-growth fintech company born to help Latam small-and-medium businesses (SMB, PyMEs) reach their full potential. It partners with small and medium-sized lenders that have intimate knowledge of specific markets and industries. Cordada provides them funding, technological solutions and financial expertise to help them provide their customers the best service.
The company has a solid track record and an attractive growth plan to become a major player in the SMB financing market in Latin America.
As a back-end software engineer you will be part of the engineering team of the company, where robustness is fundamental. You will design and build new apps and services.
If you are one of those people who like to build solutions or systems where quality is significant, you are what we are looking for!
attributes.functions:
You will participate in the design and construction of the set of systems that, among others:
1.- Allow loans to companies through different modalities and alliances.
2.- Collect, store and make available a wide variety of data sources.
3.- Monitor insolvency signals.
4.- Calculate risk scoring of actors and operations.
You will have the opportunity to create architectures and services from scratch.
You are ideal for the job if with your professional maturity you are able to choose the appropriate technology for each problem, without getting carried away by what is fashionable.
attributes.benefits:
1. A truly shaping tech position with high degrees of responsibility and autonomy

  3. A highly talented, dynamic, and multicultural team
  4. Entrepreneurial experience in a well-financed, high-growth company
  5. Work with the best technologies available
  6. Support for contributing to open source software

  • Django
  • Banking or lending software
  • BPM

Credit√∫ es una administradora de mutuos hipotecarios endosables, en palabras simples otorga cr√©ditos hipotecarios a clientes individuales que quieren comprar una propiedad y estos son financiados por la venta de mutuos a clientes institucionales (inversionistas).

attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name, Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place! How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America. The engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Corbin and Brooks
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Corbin and Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company. We work closely with a small number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
The Corbin & Brooks team have over 50 years‚Äô combined experience with software and web development, UI and product design. Our roots are in enterprise web application development. In 2014 the energy management SaaS company we co-founded was acquired, and we started a private contracting business. We currently provide extremely responsive custom software development services for a small group of clients. Our specialty is custom development of enterprise software applications, and interactive UI design.

Our philosophy is to work with a small number of clients and serve as their ongoing development team. We strive to work responsively, offer co-coding to ensure multiple team members always understand a code so a project can be picked up at any time, and keep projects on schedule for our clients.

We work 100% remotely, and communicate throughout the day using project management software and videoconferencing when needed.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Corbin & Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company.

We work closely with a limited number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team for their projects.

We are currently looking for a competent project manager who loves gathering requirements, organizing JIRA boards, talking with clients, zoom meetings, and communicating with our internal team to move projects forward. Our mission is for every project to be on time and within budget.

The project management position won't take the entire 40 hour work week, so we are expecting this person will also perform QA tasks approximately half of the work week. QA requirements will be learning how to run projects locally, testing the features developed by developers, and reporting bugs and issues found.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
Corbin & Brooks offers an extremely flexible work schedule, fully remote work, and lots of flexibility when it comes to planning vacations and time off for life events.

Our projects are almost all long term projects where we are building exciting and innovative web and mobile applications which are being used by real customers in a variety of industries.

We are proud to have a friendly and communicative work environment with a positive team of people across North and South America.

This position is a contract position and the applicant will not technically be an employee of the company, but there will be an expectation of 160 hours of work per month.

attributes.title: Desarrollador Front-end
attributes.description:
Profesi√≥n relacionada con la ingenier√≠a af√≠n a los √°mbitos del desarrollo de software con experiencia de al menos 3 a√±os trabajando como desarrollador front-end en productos o proyectos con tecnolog√≠as de punta, sin importar la industria en la que se haya desempe√±ado.
La metodolog√≠a de desarrollo busca seguir TDD con el fin de lograr la mayor cobertura para pruebas y asegurar un correcto funcionamiento de lo realizado.
El core del desarrollo front-end es Angular en su versi√≥n 10+ y junto con ello se requiere tener experiencia con JSON/XML, HTML5, CSS3 y Javascript.
Como las soluciones front no viven solas, es necesario manejarse con base de datos MySQL/MariaDB a nivel usuario, con facilidad en la ejecuci√≥n de consultas SQL de cara al front-end, y con arquitecturas RESTful, teniendo experiencia con APIs REST.
Todo el desarrollo se mantiene bajo un sistema de control de versiones Gitlab, manejando herramientas de Integraci√≥n Continua.
attributes.projects:
Buscamos un profesional que la pase bien codeando, que comparta sus conocimientos y que quiera seguir aprendiendo. Que nos desaf√≠e, logrando la mejora continua de nuestros desarrollos y procesos. Si quieres marcar la diferencia, crear valor e impactar positivamente en el entorno, entonces debes seguir leyendo.
Creemos en la experiencia y en las heridas de guerra de varios a√±os enfrentando soluciones tecnol√≥gicas, pero tambi√©n creemos en el talento joven, que sin duda puede aportar much√≠simo al dinamismo y el empuje de nuevas innovaciones.
Necesitamos a alguien comprometido con sus objetivos, pero sin descuidar su vida personal. Que est√© abierto a nuevos desaf√≠os, que quiera desplegar su pasi√≥n por la tecnolog√≠a, abarcando tem√°ticas de diversas √≠ndoles, como todos en el equipo.
Nos preocupamos de mantener un excelente ambiente de trabajo, por lo que es sumamente importante querer trabajar en equipo, ser honesto y expresarte con claridad.
attributes.functions:
El objetivo primario del cargo es desarrollar interfaces de usuario del lado del cliente teniendo como foco maximizar su experiencia. Mantenedores, reportes y configuradores, integrados con un fuerte back-end, son parte de las interfaces a desarrollar.
Para lograr esto es importante mantenerse activo y comunicativo dentro del equipo, analizando e implementando soluciones de software a los problemas planteados. Este trabajo se realiza mediante una metodolog√≠a √°gil, teniendo que participar activamente en todas las ceremonias relacionadas.
Desafiar los paradigmas del desarrollo front-end es algo que es posible realizar con nosotros, buscando siempre la mejor manera de enfrentar los problemas tecnol√≥gicos, y maximizando los avances funcionales comprometidos en cada sprint.
La mantenci√≥n de las soluciones es relevante, por lo que hay ocasiones en que es necesario revisar y solucionar aspectos cr√≠ticos de desarrollos productivos, adem√°s de mantenerlos o realizar actualizaciones en el tiempo. Todo lo anterior sin olvidar documentar lo realizado.

attributes.description_headline: You can be part of the gang if:
attributes.description:

attributes.projects:
A little bit about us:

We are Belvo, a financial API platform for Latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information. We are turning the rich and diverse Latam financial ecosystem into a set of developer-friendly tools and APIs.

We‚Äôre a highly-technical, passionate and driven team. We have offices in Barcelona, Mexico City and S√£o Paulo and some of us work remotely.

We are tackling a very challenging problem: connecting fintech innovators with legacy financial infrastructure. We strive to go beyond the limits of what is possible today and to do so in an elegant and developer-first way.

Our tech stack:

  • We're building our platform using modern technologies, putting the focus on reliability and long-term maintainability
  • We primarily use Python on the backend. We use battle-tested technologies such as Django, and we are heavy users of Python's asyncio for some parts of our stack
  • We use Javascript, Vue.js and Sass on the frontend.
attributes.functions:
The experience team is building applications and services that expose end-users' financial information through a set of public-facing, easy to use APIs. In addition to that, we take care of the Developer Experience through documentation, SDKs, examples and other developer-facing tools.

  • Develop our client-facing APIs, especially as we add data sources, endpoints or a new product altogether.
  • Build excellent documentation, SDKs, client libraries. Continuously improve the "developer experience" of Belvo's platform.
  • Be customer-focused, think as a user of our APIs. Proactively tackle potential improvements and customer pain points.
  • Carefully manage API retro compatibility, document API changes and implement deprecation plans.
  • Implement automated quality assurance and monitoring modules.

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Belvo is the leading Open Banking API platform in Latin America and the easiest way for users to connect their account to an app
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Come build the future of finance in Latin America

We are Belvo, a financial API platform for Latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information, through an easy-to-use API.

We are backed by some of the leading investors from Silicon Valley and Latam, including Founders Fund, Kaszek Ventures and Y Combinator (YC W20).

What we
believe in

Community-driven focus

We build tech infrastructure for developers that drives and grows communities across our clients and their users. We also aspire to foster transparency across the board with our software and tools.

We get things done

We are pragmatic decision-makers, we are a KISStartup and we focus on building things with accountability.

Fun-loving

We enjoy working on hard challenges that are bigger than ourselves and have a lot of fun doing it.

Diversity wins

We are a diverse team that cares about our impact. We deeply care about our clients, our partners, our team, and all the work that we do for them.

The mission

We aim to power the next generation of financial services in Latin America through a bank and financial data API platform. We do the dirty work in the infrastructure trenches so that our clients can build easier, faster and better. Latin America is a very exciting and dynamic place to be in right now and a great place to build infrastructure for the next generation of financial products for a huge market.

The team

We‚Äôre a highly-technical, passionate and driven team based in Mexico City and Barcelona that is tackling a very challenging problem: connecting fintech innovators with legacy financial infrastructure. We strive to go beyond the limits of what is possible today and to do so in an elegant and developer-first way.

attributes.title: Full-Stack Developer RoR
attributes.description:
En Garage Labs tenemos s√≥lo dos requisitos excluyentes para todo integrante de nuestro equipo:

  1. Ganas y capacidad para estar constantemente aprendiendo nuevas tecnolog√≠as y formas de trabajar. Nuestra forma de trabajar hace que pocas cosas se mantengan fijas por mucho tiempo, ya que siempre se puede hacer algo de una mejor manera o hay una nueva tecnolog√≠a que podr√≠a solucionar una serie de problemas latentes. Debido a esto, es fundamental contar con la disposici√≥n a aprender nuevas tecnolog√≠as y formas de trabajar, dado que la Mejora Continua es uno de nuestros valores fundamentales.
  2. Saber trabajar en equipo. Si bien Garage Labs es un √∫nico gran equipo, nos dividimos en c√©lulas de trabajo m√°s peque√±as que llevan a cabo cada uno de nuestros desarrollos y proyectos de forma aut√≥noma. Dado que todos los equipos son multidisciplinarios, es necesario saber c√≥mo comunicar adecuadamente las ideas y dudas a personas con diferentes perfiles de conocimiento, as√≠ como tambi√©n es importante la asertividad al momento de hacer cr√≠ticas y autocr√≠ticas. Adem√°s, es muy importante fomentar la buena onda y compa√±erismo dentro de cada equipo, para que trabajar sea una grata experiencia para todos.
  3. Manejo m√≠nimo de RoR. Nuestro stack de tecnolog√≠as se basa en Ruby On Rails (versiones 4+ y 5+), por lo que es importante conocer el patr√≥n MVC y sus derivados, pero no es necesario tener amplia experiencia en el uso de este framework (eso es algo que se puede adquirir con la pr√°ctica).
attributes.projects:

Apoyamos a nuestros clientes en su proceso de transformaci√≥n digital, desarrollando aplicaciones web y m√≥viles, integrando herramientas existentes y dise√±ando procesos que les permitan maximizar el valor entregado y el cumplimiento de los objetivos planteados.

Con un enfoque √°gil, trabajamos en equipos multidisciplinarios peque√±os que entienden y especifican las necesidades y problem√°ticas de los clientes, para luego desarrollar soluciones con el m√°ximo aporte de valor, en el menor tiempo posible. ¬°Nos gustan mucho los MVPs!

Somos un equipo joven en un ambiente startup, actualmente trabajando 100% remoto. No nos preocupamos por el cumplimiento de horarios, el trabajo en oficina o remoto ni el c√≥digo de vestimenta (salvo cuando hayan reuniones con clientes, no se ver√≠a bien ir con chalas zico y traje de ba√±o a una reuni√≥n corporativa, ¬øo s√≠?). Tenemos 10 d√≠as de vacaciones adicionales!

Puedes conocer m√°s de nuestra cultura aqu√≠: art√≠culo.
attributes.functions:
En una primera instancia, ser√°s responsable de la mantenci√≥n y soporte de aquellas soluciones software desarrolladas por nuestro equipo, las cuales se encuentran en producci√≥n.

Una vez comprendas e interiorices nuestra forma de trabajo y las exigencias de calidad asociadas a este, pasar√°s a ser responsable del desarrollo de una de las soluciones software de alguno de nuestros clientes.

En ambos casos trabajar√°s de manera cercana con un equipo multidisciplinario, donde cada integrante es responsable de uno de los tres aspectos del software que consideramos fundamentales: Negocio, Dise√±o y T√©cnico. En cualquiera de los casos ser√°s responsable del aspecto T√©cnico del software que sea responsabilidad del equipo, con absoluto apoyo del resto de desarrolladores y del equipo completo en todo momento.
attributes.benefits:
En Garage Labs estamos convencidos de que no existe el alto rendimiento en ambientes estresantes, por lo que nos preocupamos de tener (y mantener) un grato ambiente laboral, lleno de buena onda, humor y compa√±erismo. Para cumplir con esto, ofrecemos:

  1. Trabajo orientado al cumplimiento de objetivos
  2. Horario flexible
  3. 10 d√≠as libres adicionales al a√±o seg√∫n nuestra pol√≠tica de vacaciones
  4. Posibilidad de hacer Home Office las veces que creas necesario
  5. Estacionamiento de bicis y duchas
  6. Poder venir a trabajar con la ropa que quieras. Salvo cuando haya reuniones con clientes (en ning√∫n caso terno o taco alto, por si acaso)
  7. Caf√© y t√© ilimitados
  8. Muchos espacios diferentes para trabajar, adem√°s de tu puesto dentro de la oficina. Puede ser en la terraza para m√°s comodidad o en el patio zen para mayor concentraci√≥n
  9. Muchas excusas para celebrar con un asado en la oficina (tenemos parrilla y una terraza ad-hoc para tales fines) o para ir por hamburguesas y cervezas a uno de los bares cercanos
attributes.desirable:
